categories.title: Cave
categories.info: Caves are hidden, underground tunnels. Each contains various materials, chests and a single Bubbulfrog.

categories.title: Goddess Statue
categories.info: Pray at Goddess Statues to increase Link's maximum health or stamina. Each stat upgrade requires 4 x Light of Blessings.

categories.title: Great Fairy
categories.info: Great Fairies will improve armor in exchange for materials and rupees. To achieve higher enhancement levels, you must unlock additional Great Fairies.

categories.title: Lighthouse
categories.info: Use ascend while standing underneath it to return to the Surface

categories.title: Lightroot
categories.info: Interact with Lightroots to illuminate the Depths and create Fast Travel spots.

categories.title: Shrine
categories.info: Shrines are small dungeons scattered throughout Hyrule. Interact with one to unlock a Fast Travel point, and then complete the challenge inside to grant a Light of Blessing.

categories.title: Bargainer Statue
categories.info: Bargainer Statues are special vendors whose inventory expands as you discover more of them.

categories.title: Hestu
categories.info: Hestu will expand your maximum inventory capacity in exchange for Korok Seeds.

categories.title: Koltin
categories.info: Only appearing at night, Koltin's shop offers unique items in exchange for Bubbul Gems.

categories.title: Dragon Tear
categories.info: Dragon Tears can be found after completing [Impa and the Geoglyphs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276885). Scan the geoglyph from above, then search it for the Dragon Tear, which should yield a Memory.

categories.title: Key Item
categories.info: Key Items are unique items scattered through Hyrule. They are often obtained or awarded through main quests, and are required to progress through the game.

categories.title: Korok Seed
categories.info: Korok Seeds are hidden everywhere on Hyrule and the Sky Islands. Bring them to Hestu to expand your inventory.

categories.title: Paraglider Fabric
categories.info: Unlocks new customization options at Dye Shops for Link's paraglider.

categories.title: Rupees
categories.info: Rupees are the currency of Hyrule. Each Rupee has a different value (Green = 1; Blue = 5; Red = 20; Purple = 50; Silver = 100; Gold = 300)

categories.title: Shield
categories.info: Shields are used by Link to defens against enemy attacks. Shields found in the overworld and chests might be of a higher tier, depending on your game's progress.

categories.title: Weapon
categories.info: Weapons are used by Link to fight his way through enemies. Weapons found in the overworld might be of a higher tier, depending on your game's progress.

categories.title: Memory
categories.info: Memories are short, lore-related cutscenes. They are obtained from Dragon Tears or, sometimes, story-related events.

categories.title: Side Adventure
categories.template:
**Previous Side Adventure:** ??  

**How To Begin:** ??  

**Reward:** ??

**Next Side Adventure:** ??

categories.title: Side Quest
categories.info: Side Quests are optional quests, given by NPCs all through Hyrule. Look for small red (!) under their dialogue.

categories.title: Enemy Camp
categories.info:
Enemy Camps are locations filled with enemies guarding a single locked or open chest.  

Enemies are progress-dependent

categories.title: Octorok
categories.info:
All Rock Octoroks have a random chance to spawn at these locations.

Drop a weapon in front of a Rock Octorock; it will absorb the weapon and spit it back out, repaired and with a random bonus. Works once per Octorock, but resets with Blood Moons.

categories.title: Falling Platform
categories.info: Use the Recall skill on these platforms that fall from the clouds to ride them up to the Sky

categories.title: Hudson Sign
categories.info: Hudson Signs are signposts that Addison tries to scatter across Hyrule. Use the nearby materials to build a free-standing structure that supports the sign. His rewards are random.

categories.title: Satori Tree
categories.info: Offer a piece of fruit at the altar under the cherry-blossom trees and the Horse God will highlight caves on the map for you.

categories.title: Well
categories.info: Wells are hidden, underground areas. They often contain resources and other precious materials.

locations.title: Hateno Pasture

locations.title: Ascend Tower Depths
locations.description: An area in the depths designed to ascend you to the surface, so players can escape without Fast Travel.

Walk behind the shrine and continue to a small alcove.

locations.title: Ancient Prison Ruins
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- [Ancient Prison Ruins Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=285230)

**Bubbulfrog:** In the lower under-cell floor, there will be a ramp of rumble leading up to a cell with falling floor tiles. Stand on the falling tiles and descend into a different under-cell floor with the Bubbulfrog on the ceiling. ( -3210, -3210, -0047)

**Inside the Cave:**
- [Chichim Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278146): After grabbing the Gerudo Scimitar, Ultrahand reveals two movable blocks of stone hiding a lever. Pull the lever to access the shrine.
- Purple rupee [Chest]: In a gated-off room. Come in from below.
- Topaz rupee [Chest]: In a gated-off room. Come in from below.

locations.title: Tobio's Hollow Cave
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
On the Northside of the Mountain, Glowstone ore on either side of entrance

**Bubbulfrog:** At the very bottom

**Inside the Cave:**
- 9 Keese near the entrance, 2 Yellow Slimes Near Entrance
- Small camp at the bottom with two Zonanite Spear
- To Finish the puzzle, attach Keese Wing to Zonanite Spear and throw it through the circle in the middle of the pond (this opens the shrine)
- Shrine is Utoji's Shrine
- Further in are 2 Like Like with chest containing Shield of the Mind's Eye
- 5 more Keese and at the very bottom there is a bubble frog

locations.title: Rauru Hillside Cave
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- [Rauru Hillside Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280388)

**Bubbulfrog:** Go right and shoot the stonewall with a bombflower. It is hanging on the ceiling in the chamber behind the rockwall.

**Inside the Cave:**
- LikeLike (normal) 
- 4 Hobogoblins (1 blue, 3 normal)
- Brightbloom seeds
- Unlockable chests (Lizal Spear)
- Raw Meat
- Brightcaps
- Arrows (in metal boxes)
- Roasted Bass
- Amber
- Ruby
- Topaz
- Fairy (3x)

locations.title: Lake Intenoch Cave
locations.description:
WARNING: Intense heat! Requires heat resistance elixirs or flame guard armor. Any wooden weapons will ignite and degrade. Do *NOT* use bombs to clear the cracked rocks; due to the extreme heat, they will immediately explode when taken out of your inventory.

**Cave Entrances:** On the edges of Gero Pond

**Bubbulfrog:** This cave contains tunnels filled with cracked rock. Follow the path going west until you reach a cavern with lava and ore deposits. The Bubbulfrog will be lurking on the cave's ceiling.

**Inside the Cave:**
- [Moshapin Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278869)
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282307)

locations.title: Foothill Monster Den
locations.description:

**Bubbulfrog:** Behind the breakable wall near the ceiling along the left tunnel as you enter  

**Inside the Cave:**
Side quest objective [For Our Princess](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280509) where you have to defeat:
- 1 armored Bokoblin
- 1 Moblin
- and a few other regular Bokoblins

**Inside the Cave:**

- Ruby [Chest]
- Soldier's Broadsword (In chest behind Fire Like)
- 2 Bokoblin
- 2 Moblin
- 1 Fire Like
- 20 Fire Keese
- 18 Ore Deposits
- 1 Luminous Stone Deposit
- 144 Brightbloom Seeds
- 20 Giant Brightbloom Seeds

And a large number of:

- Smotherwing Butterflies
- Fireproof Lizards

**Bubbulfrog:** After breaking the brown rocks in the cave's first chamber, go through the left waterfall in the second chamber. The bubbulfrog is found at the end of that tunnel. There is a Shock Like that may block your way.

**Inside the Cave:**

- 1 x Bomb Flower

locations.title: Mount Nabooru Cave

**Inside the Cave:**

**Cave Entrances:**

**Bubbulfrog:** Highest level in cave along north west wall. 

**Inside the Cave:**

- Opal [Chest]
- Zora Shield [Chest]
- Zora Longsword [Chest]
- Large Zonai Charge [Chest]: It is beneath some thorns. Create a roof using the wood planks to prevent the water from putting out the fire

locations.title: Upland Zorana Foothill Cave

**Cave Entrances:**

**Bubbulfrog:** Use Ascend or climb to the back of the cave. You will have to go up two levels and get through two or three breakable rock walls.

**Inside the Cave:**

locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- Entrance is at the very top of the waterfall in Kakariko Village

**Bubbulfrog:** On the ceiling in the second chamber

**Inside the Cave:**
- 3 x Fairy
- 4 x Ore Deposit
- 2 x Hearty Truffle
- 12 x Brightbloom Seed
- 2 x Glowing Cave Fish

locations.title: Mount Floria Cave
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- ??

**Bubbulfrog:** Located up a ramp in the main chamber leading to a makeshift jail cell.  Break a wall to enter the jail cell and then break a second wall inside the cell to locate the chamber with the bubbulfrog.

**Inside the Cave:**
- Large Zonai Charge (chest) Located at top of large square tower in middle of main chamber.
- Star Fragment (chest) located in a makeshift jailcell up a ramp located in the main chamber. Need to break a rock wall to enter the jail cell.

locations.title: Luto's Channel
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- ??

**Bubbulfrog:** ??  

**Inside the Cave:**
- ??

locations.title: Reservoir Lakefront Cavern
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- At water level.

**Bubbulfrog:** Behind the vines to the left, just after the entrance. **Coordinates:** 3921. 0385, 0212  

**Inside the Cave:**
- Blue stone for [The Blue Stone](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283904) side quest

locations.title: Ulria Grotto South Cave
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- Ulria Grotto South Cave Entrance

**Bubbulfrog:** Behind blue breakable rocks and behind the large center pillar on ceiling 

**Inside the Cave:**
- [Stone Talus]()

locations.title: Rassla Lake Cave
locations.description:
**Cave Entrances:**
- Behind the rubble in the ground

**Bubbulfrog:** One level above entrance, need to make it up the broken stairs.

**Inside the Cave:**
- Large Zonai Charge [Chest]

The water level in the cave goes down on a clear day, granting access to the chest on the floor of the second chamber.

locations.title: Goddess Statue of Wisdom
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Pray to the Goddess Statue

**Solution:** Retrieve Naydra's Claw and offer it to the Goddess Statue by dropping it in the water

**Reward:** One Sapphire

locations.title: Goddess Statue of Courage
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with the Goddess Statue  

**Solution:** Find [Farosh, Lightning Dragon](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278139) and shoot his claws to drop part of it. Offer Farosh's Claw and drop it into the water.

**Reward:** 1x Topaz

locations.title: Goddess Statue of Power
locations.description:
Bring Dinraal's Claw to her and drop it in the water.

**Reward:** One Ruby

locations.title: Goddess Statue - Lurelin Village
locations.description: Lurelin Village, on the shoreline beside the inn

locations.title: Horse God Malanya
locations.description:
**Required:** Endura Carrot

Unique among the Great Fairies is Malanya, a spirit that looks over the horses of Hyrule. She can revive and enhance horses that Link has registered at stables.

In lieu of materials and rupees, Malanya asks for **meals** in exchange for her services.

locations.title: Great Fairy Mija
locations.description:
Unlocking the Great Fairies involves a series of Side Adventures. Ultimately, you will need to reunite all the members of [The Stable Trotters](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499) and have them lure the Great Fairies out of their flower Buds with beautiful music.

Here is the Side Adventure sequence you must complete to unlock Mija:
- [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)
- [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)
- [The Hornist's Dramatic Escape](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280076)
- [Serenade to Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)

locations.title: Great Fairy Cotera
locations.description:
Unlocking the Great Fairies involves a series of Side Adventures. Ultimately, you will need to reunite all the members of [The Stable Trotters](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499) and have them lure the Great Fairies out of their flower Buds with beautiful music.

Here is the Side Adventure sequence you must complete to unlock Cotera:
1. [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)
2. [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)
3. [Honey, Bee Mine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279476)
4. [Serenade to Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279990)

locations.title: Great Fairy Kaysa
locations.description:
Unlocking the Great Fairies involves a series of Side Adventures. Ultimately, you will need to reunite all the members of [The Stable Trotters](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499) and have them lure the Great Fairies out of their flower Buds with beautiful music.

Here is the Side Adventure sequence you must complete to unlock Kaysa:
1. [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)
2. [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)
3. [The Flute Player's Plan](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280107)
4. [Serenade to Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280108)

locations.title: Great Fairy Tera
locations.description:
Unlocking the Great Fairies involves a series of Side Adventures. Ultimately, you will need to reunite all the members of [The Stable Trotters](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499) and have them lure the Great Fairies out of their flower Buds with beautiful music.

Tera will be the first Great Fairy you unlock, and therefore has the shortest sequence to complete:
- [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)
- [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)

locations.description:
Available after completing [Lurelin Village Restoration Project](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395).

Choose one of three chests to get a random prize from the cages on the right when you enter. Giving the shop keeper a Roasted Porgy lets you try again, up to twice. Once his stock has been emptied you have to wait for the stock to replenish.

locations.title: Learnings of the Zora, Part Five
Entrance to the Great Plateau
locations.description:
Part of the Side Adventure [A Call from the Depths](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281092)

Unlocking this will allow easier entry into the Great Plateau as well as the use of horses.

locations.title: Nachoyah Shrine
locations.description:
_The Ability to Rewind_

**Location:** 0388, -1660, 2299 - Inside the [Room of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276620). After completing [The Closed Door](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279111) and receiving the Rewind ability, come back here and ride the Rewinded cogs to the shrine.  

**Solution:** 
1. Rewind the wooden raft, then jump on it to the other platform.
2. Rewind the wooden raft, then jump on it to move up the waterfall.
3. In the next room, turn right. Wait until both hands are aligned, then Rewind one of them. Walk through the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 10x Arrow - On a platform, above the water next to the cog. Rewind the cog to access.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Nachoyah Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Gutanbac Shrine
locations.description:
_The Ability to Rise_

**Location:** 0709, -1381, 1584 - ??  
**Solution:** 
1. Ascend from the ground to the higher platform.
2. Ascend through the right-most pillar.
3. Defeat the Construct Guardian.
4. Cut the ropes of the bridge, which will fall down, then Ascend through it to reach the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Stone Axe [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279250) - In the 2nd room, ascend through the left-most pillar first.
- [Construct Bow [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279251) - In the construct room, destroy the wooden boxes in the right wall to reveal an alcove; Ascend in the alcove to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Gutanbac Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Ukouh Shrine
locations.description:
_The Ability to Create_

**Location:** 0274, -0913, 1460 - ??  
**Solution:**
1. Move the stone slab to create a bridge and cross the first gap.
2. Using Ultrahand, glue both slabs together to create an even longer bridge, and cross the second gap.
3. Ultrahand a Hook on a Board, to create a platform, and place it on the rail. Jump on it and ride it to the end.

**Treasure:** 
- Amber - Beyond the second gap, use the long bridge to reach a higher platform in the corner.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ukouh Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: In-isa Shrine
locations.description:
_The Ability to Combine_

**Location:** 0027, -1503, 1408 - ??  

**Solution:** 
1. Fuse the Boulder to any weapon (such as the nearby Broadsword) to create a Hammer. Use this hammer to smash the cracked pillars on the far side of the room.
2. In the next room, turn right and collect the Fire Fruits from the bushes.
3. Fire a Flaming Arrow at the vine-covered platform against the far wall. You can make an arrow flaming by Fusing a Fire Fruit to it.
4. Grab the Small Key from the fallen chest, and unlock the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 5x Arrow - On a pillar, in the second room. Break it using a makeshift hammer to drop the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom In Isa Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Yamiyo Shrine
locations.description:
_Combat Training: Throwing_

**Location:** 0334, 0467, 0029

**Solution:** 
- Defeat the construct, following the on-screen prompts

**Treasure:** 
- Bomb Flower x3 - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Yamiyo Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Mayachin Shrine
locations.description:
**Location:** -0705, -0865, 0031 - Windvane Meadow, near the Exchange Ruins.  

**Solution:** 
- First step on square pressure pad on floor for the first target to appear. 
- Attach a pole to the flat side of a stake, then attach stake to backside of the mechanism in middle of lowered area. 
- Once attached - go to top level and swing at level to make the pole swing like a bat. 
- Wait for the ball to hit 3rd to 4th notch on ground for correct timing. 

**Treasure:** 
- Energizing Elixir - must hit second target

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayachin Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kamizun Shrine
locations.description:
_Proving Grounds: Beginner_

**Location:** -0177, -1557, 0023 - ??  

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat all the constructs, using only the gear provided in the room.

**Treasure:** 
- [Spring Shield [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280446) - Just before the end statue.

locations.title: Jiosin Shrine
locations.description:
_Shape Rotation_

**Location:** -3983, -1084, 0624 - ??  

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the long piece of stone, and rotate it so it fits through the X-shaped hole in the wall.
2. Use the long piece of stone to create a bridge to the other side.
3. Repeat the process for the dual-cube-shaped piece of rock, rotating it so it fits through both walls.
4. Place the shape to create a staircase to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Hasty Elixir - On a ledge, in the 2nd puzzle room. After crossing the first gate, place the two blocks in the hole to create a staircase to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jiosin Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Zanmik Shrine
locations.description:
_Scoop It Out_

**Location:** 3469, -2179, 0148 - Overlooking [Hateno Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276892), by the eastern gate. 

**Solution:** 
1. Drop down, then Attach a ball to the wheel.
2. Place a metal plate on the circuit to close it, activating the wheel.
3. Climb back up, and drop the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Longsword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279699) - Attach 4 plates in a 2x2 formation, then Attach it to the wheel before activating it. This should scoop the balls out and reveal the chest underneath.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Zanmik Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Turakamik Shrine
locations.description:
_Hidden Metal_

**Location:** -2654, -2238, 0067 - On a high ledge on the side of the canyon road. 

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the electrified ball to the other to close the circuit and activate the giant cog. Ride it to the higher ledge.
2. Using Ultrahand, swing one of the balls side-to-side, then Attach the other one to it. Then, Ascend to the alternating pillars.
3. Dislodge the pipe from the cog system, and place it on the beams next to the electrified ball. Attach the ball to it to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282819) - In the 3rd room, before removing the pole, Recall the cog and ride it to the higher ledge.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Turakawak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Mayatat Shrine
locations.description:
_A Sliding Device_

**Location:** -3290, -2512, 0024 - Near the Kara Kara Bazaar 

**Solution:** 
1. Recall one of the sliding sleds, then jump on it to reach the higher ledge.
2. Attach a Steering Stick and a Fan to the Sled, then pilot it to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Arrow x10 - In the large room, on a higher platform to the left. Pilot the boat there first, then glide to the lower platform and build another one to reach the end.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayatat Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Soryotanog Shrine
locations.description:
_Buried Light_

**Location:** -3884, -2964, 0123 - At the top of the palace in Gerudo Town 

**Solution:** 
1. Dislodge the Fan from the sand dune. Activate it, then Ultrahand it to blow away the last sand dune.
2. Pick up the Small Key from the chest and open the door.
3. In the next room, Ascend to the ledge on the left and destroy the construct.
4. Blow away the sand dunes to reveal both a beam of light and a mirror. Place the mirror on the upper ledge to reflect the beam through the gates. Aim at the corner of the walls beyond the bars.
5. Return in the first room, and blow away the mirror from the sand dune. Using Ultrahand, reflect the light beam into the hexagon above the door.

**Treasure:** 
- 10x Arrows - Beyond the Small Key door, turn right and crouch in the alcove. There, blow away the sand dunes and grab the Fan Guster from the defeated construct. Glide to the upper ledge using your Fan, then attack the sand dune with the Fan Guster to blow it away. The cog should move and open the door to the chest.

locations.title: Ishodag Shrine
locations.description:
_A Windy Device_

**Location:** On top of the rocky mound.  

**Solution:** 
- Rotate the first fan so it is blowing air up, close to the next floor, and use your glider to get to the next floor. 
- Attach the second fan to the back of the board and activate it to float across the water. 
- Take the fan off the wooden platform and attach it to the small platform that can be dragged up and down leading to the next floor, facing up and activate it. Leave it for now.
- Attach one of the fans to the bottom of the rotating concrete platform to get the chest upright. Use the second fan to blow your glider up to the platform. 
- Open the chest and use the ultrahand to push the previous platform up as high as you can take it. Let it drop back down. 
- Get on top of the platform and use Recall so it goes back up. Use your glider with the fan you placed there earlier and that will get you to the shrine's end. 

**Treasure:** 
- Opal - Stuck to a pivoting platform, past the pool. Attach a fan to the platform, just under the chest, and activate it to rotate the platform. Then, Ascend through to open the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ishodag Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Jonsau Shrine
locations.description:
_Deep Force_

**Location:** 1751, 0011, 0034 - On a grassy plain, near the shore.

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the floating ball underneath the target, then push it down the water and release it. It should launch upwards and hit the target.
2. In the next room, defeat the construct.
3. Repeat step 1 with the floating board, placing it vertically so it launches straight.
4. In the next room, launch the floating ball under the moving platform to dislodge it and let it fall into the water. Then, jump in the platform and Recall it to the top.
5. Paraglide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283430) - In the 2nd room, in the water by the first pillar. Grab it with Ultrahand.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jonsau Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Morok Shrine
locations.description:
_A Bouncy Device_

**Location:** 1178, -0781, 0133 - On a floating island, connected to the ground by a thick root. Climb up the root, or glide from the higher sky islands. 

**Solution:** 
1. Step on the launch pad to launch Link upwards and glide to the ledge.
2. Step on the Spring, then activate it to launch Link upwards and glide to the ledge.
3. Bring the Spring against the right-most fence, and use it to reach the platform.
4. On that platform, take the Spring and prop it against the slanted slab to create a makeshift launch pad. Use it to send the ball on the main platform and into the socket.
5. Glide back to the main platform, then Attach the Spring to the other 2 in the next room. Place the triple spring against the far wall.
6. Climb the triple spring, then activate it to reach the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Sneaky Elixir - After activating the triple Spring, glide to the platform halfway up the steep wall.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Morok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Teniten Shrine
locations.description:
_Combat Training: Throwing_

**Location:** -0075, -115, 0021 - Out in the open, just east of the lake.  

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the construct, following the on-screen prompts.

**Treasure:** 
- Zonaite Spear - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Teniten Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Tukarok Shrine
locations.description:
_Forward Force_

**Location:** 0915, -0250, -0034 - In a grove beside the stable. 

**Solution:** 
1. Walk to the end of the hallway and drop down.
2. Attach the ball to the vehicule, then activate it to make it cross the lava.
3. Attach the Big Wheel to the slab on the rail, then Attach the rectangular slab to it and the ball on top. When activated, the slab should advance all the way to the top.
4. Bring the ball into the next room, and Attach it to the board with wheels. Then, Attach a board to each Wheel to create paddles.
5. Place the paddleboat between the fences and activate it, then place the ball on the pressure plate to open the door.
6. Place the ball in the socket to reach the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Sword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279459) - Under the water, between the two fences. Grab it with Ultrahand.

media.title: E3DD4DB8-3E29-4B8E-AC4A-AF36710504FE
The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Tukarok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Eutoum Shrine
locations.description:
_Proving Grounds: Infiltration_

**Location:** -3509, 3568, 0387 - Against the far side of the peak. 

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the constructs, using only the gear provided in the room.

**Treasure:** 
- Sapphire - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Eutoum Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Gatakis Shrine
locations.description:
_Ride the Winds_

**Location:** -3651, 1805, 0168 - Inside Rito Village, jump down from the main path to reach a side ledge. 

**Solution:** 
1. Gliding with your paraglider, use the gusts to guide Link through the obstacles.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280000) - Past the ice barrier, on a high ledge guarded by a construct.

locations.title: Ijo-o Shrine
locations.description:
_More than Defense_

**Location:** -3862, 2679, 0702 - On a lonely sky island. 

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the construct, then use his Flame-Emitter Shield to melt the ice block in the doorway.
2. Defeat the construct on the left, then use his Stone-Slab shield to move beyond the flames into the next room.
3. Defeat the construct in the large room. Then, Attach a few Rockets on the stone slab, and use it as a launching platform to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Arrow x5 - Beyond the doorway, within an ice block. Melt it with the Flame-Emitter Shield.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ijo O Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Mayaumekis Shrine
locations.description:
_Downward Force_

**Location:** -2947, 3051, 0897 - Rising Island Chain of the Hebra Sky 

**Solution:** 
1. Shoot the crystal through the bars to open the door.
2. Defeat the construct atop the ledge, then jump and bounce off the trampoline to the ledge above.
3. Wait for the moving trampoline to move closer, then jump on the trampoline just beneath and glide to it.
4. Wait for it to move closer, then bounce on the next platform.
5. Bounce on the nearby trampoline, and at the peak of the jump, shoot the crystal through the bars.
6. Head to the trampoline ahead, and bounce to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Arrow x10 - In the corner of the main room, on a high pillar. While on the moving trampoline, bounce once you reach the corner.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayaumekis Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Runakit Shrine
locations.description:
_Built to Carry_

**Location:** -2527, 1169, 0177 - In the open, west of the tower. 

**Solution:** 
1. Climb the ladder on the farthest ledge, then place the ball on the rails to slide it to the lower ledge.
2. Attach both poles together, then the ball under it in the center. Place the contraption on the rails, which should slide to the lower ledge.
3. Build the following contraption. Then, place it on the single rail to slide it to the starting platform.
    - Attach two square stone slabs in an L-shape.
    - Under each slab, attach a pole so it looks like a roof with 2 columns.
    - Attach the ball to both pillars.
4. Place the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282768) - On a pillar, beyond the 2nd lower ledge. Attach multiple stone slabs end-to-end to make a ramp to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Runakit Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Sahirow Shrine
locations.description:
_Aid from Above_

**Location:** -3354, 2387, 0361 - Near the top of Corvash Peak. 

**Solution:** 
1. Cross the laser-filled hallway. Jump over the low lasers and crouch under the others.
2. Ascend to the higher platform and turn left.
3. Cross the two hallways, jumping over the 1st laser and crouching under the 2nd.
4. In the final hallway, wait for the structure to be near, then Ascend through the top and glide to the end platform.

**Treasure:** 
- Spicy Elixir - On the higher platform, crouch under the laser. Then, Ultrahand the block in front of the laser to open the gate to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Sahirow Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Sinakawak Shrine
locations.description:
_An Uplifting Device_

**Location:** -1372, 0749, 0086 - Just behind [New Serenne Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276878).  

**Solution:** 
1. Create a makeshift Hot-air Platform; you can do so by attaching a Candle to the center of a Board, then attacking a Balloon on top of the candle.
2. Use the hot-air platform to reach the higher ledge; if the platform flies away, you can Rewind it to the ground.
3. Dislodge the Board from the hot-air platform, and place the Candle-Balloon in front of the gate. It should rise and open the gate.
4. Paraglide to the bottom floor, and make another Hot-air Platform, this time attaching the small ball to it.
5. Ascend to the higher ledge, then Dislodge the ball into the small socket, opening the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Opal - In the final room, make the following contraption. Attach the Large Ball to the Board, then 2 Candles on opposite corners. Finally, attach a Balloon to each candle; the contraption should slowly ascend. Dislodge it from the higher ledge and into the large socket.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Sinakawak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Tajikats Shrine
locations.description:
_Building With Logs_

**Location:** Along the river, in plain sight.

**Solution:** 
- Use Ultrahand to maneuver the log into a ramp to get up the first hurdle. Make sure to prop up the log on a corner so it doesn't roll away!
- In the next area, you will be give 2 more logs. Grab the log from the previous step, and create a tripod-looking shape with all three. The angle-fused legs should be able to lean on the ledge of the ramp, allowing you to cross without it slipping away.
- Fuse the 2 new logs into a bridge to cross the small water obstacle.
- You are given 4 additional logs. Using all 4, plus the 2 from the previous water obstacle, you need to create a bridge that is 3-logs long and 2-logs thick; the double wide bridge will prevent rolling.
- In the final area, you are given 9 logs and 2 propellers. You can either use the propellers to create a boat, or use the all the logs (plus the logs from the previous step) to create a massive bridge to the shrine's end. Or, if you have enough stamina, you can swim across.)

**Treasure:** 
- Spiky Shield: In the final area, there is a small platform on the left side of the water.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Tajikats Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Tauyosipun Shrine
locations.description:
_Forward or Backward?_

**Location:** -4535, 2878, 0262 - On the western side of the mountain.  

**Solution:** 
1. Recall one of the large balls, and run behind it as it rolls up the ramp.
2. Step on the pressure plate to block the ramp, and wait for a ball to fall into it.
3. Ultrahand the large ball and place it on the ramp.
4. Recall the first ball. pushing the 2nd one into the socket and opening the door.
5. Wait for the ball to fall on the 2nd platform, then Recall it.
6. When the ball is in mid-air, just between the two platforms, stop the Recall. It should fall into the socket and open the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282415) - Beyond the first ramp, Recall the wheel just as the chest falls onto it. It should rotate towards Link.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Tauyosipun Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kyononis Shrine
locations.description:
_Combat Training_

**Location:** -0205, 0451, 0021 - ??  

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the construct, following the on-screen prompts.

**Treasure:** 
- [Zonaite Sword [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279255) - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Kyononis Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Susuyai Shrine
locations.description:
_A Spinning Device_

**Location:** -0785, -0434, 0018 - ??  

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the moving carts away to safely cross to the other side. Make sure to bring a cart to the far side.
2. Position the cart forward, then activate it to cross the moving platform.
3. Using Ultrahand, dislodge a Wheel from the cart and attack it to the side of the crank. Activate the Wheel to rotate the crank and open the gate.
4. Remove the platform from the rail, and attach a Wheel in the opening above.
5. Replace the platform on the rail, and activate the Wheel to move the platform to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 5x Arrows - Attached to the middle cart, at the beginning of the puzzle.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Susuyai Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Sonapan Shrine
locations.description:
_Missing Pathways_

**Location:** -1921, -0361, 0228 - On the side of Satori Mountain, in an apple grove. 

**Solution:** 
1. Ascend through the ledge.
2. Place the metal cube on top of the ledge, then Ascend through it to the staircase.
3. Ultrahand the metal cube form the alcove to the pool, just underneath the ledge.
4. Ascend through the alcove on the ledge. Then, paraglide to the metal cube and Ascend to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Arrow x5 - Embedded high in a wall. After ascending the first ledge, bring the metal cube from the right alcove to the left, creating a pathway to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Sonapan Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Ihen-a Shrine
locations.description:
_Midair Perch_

**Location:** 3805 - 0573 - 0484 - At the top of the mountain, by [Miphia Court](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277431) 

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the platforms to create stairs to the ledge above.
2. Attach the grate to the platform. Then, activate it and place it above the gap; it should remain there and allow you to cross.
3. Bring the grate above the next gate, angling it upwards to access the higher ledge.
4. Attach the ball to a platform, and place it beside the metal slab.
5. Jump on the platform and shoot the crystal; this should launch the platform across the gap.
6. Place the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 5x Arrow - In the final room, in an alcove against the left wall. Place a floating platform beside it, then Ascend through.

locations.title: Rasitakiwak Shrine
locations.description:
_Proving Grounds: Vehicles_

**Location:** 4166, 1323, 0229 - Off the road near Tarrey Town.  

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat all the constructs, using only the gear provided in the room.

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Rod](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281646) - Just before the end statue.

locations.title: Mogawak Shrine
locations.description:
_The Power of Water_

**Location:** 3302, 0423, 0112 - Under the walkways of [Zora's Domain](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276828) 

**Solution:** 
1. Grab the empty Battery and place it at the end of the circuit, on the right.
2. Attach the stone plate on the wheel, opposite of the other. Then, move it slightly to get it moving and recharge the Battery.
3. Jump in the moving platform, then place the Battery in the socket to power it upwards to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Opal - After recharging the battery, bring it close to the left-side pool. Cross the water, then Ultrahand the battery on the plate to complete the circuit and open the door to the chest.
- Magic Scepter - Use Ultrahand to lift the chest out of the water next to the waterfall.

locations.title: Orochium Shrine
locations.description:
_Courage to Fall_

**Location:** -1636, 2641, 0239 - In plain sight, north of the [Snowfield Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277694) 

**Solution:** 
1. Head left of the staircase, and destroy the construct.
2. Ascend to the higher platform, then turn right and fall down. Destroy the 2nd construct.
3. Open the door atop the staircase with Ultrahand.
4. Walk into the lasers to fall down. Walk to the end, then Ascend to the chest with the Small Key and Ascend again.
5. Defeat both constructs and open the door to grab the ball.
6. Ride the elevator up and drop the ball in the socket to open the hangar.
7. Attach the ball to the glider and ride it back to the starting room.
8. Drop the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 5x Arrows - After the 2nd construct, instead of climbing the staircase, continue forward. The chest is in an alcove, guarded by a construct.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Orochium Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kiuyoyou Shrine
locations.description:
_Fire and Ice_

**Location:** -1105, 2086, 0104 - In the open by some trees 

**Solution:** 
1. Grab the ice cube, and melt it so it fits in the alcove with the pressure plate. Place it there to open the door.
2. Glide to the other side with the air flow.
3. Ultrahand the metal plate to block the flames. Then, grab the ice cube out and Attach the metal plate on top of it. Place the cube on the spikes and let it slide back to the start.
4. Place the cube underneath the flames in the starting room to activate the pressure plate and open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 
[Zonaite Spear](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282505) - In the 2nd room. Ultrahand the smaller ice cube and place it on the higher ledge. Reach the ledge using the metal plate and climb to the chest.

locations.title: Mayausiy Shrine
locations.description:
_Building Blocks_

**Location:** -1165, 2602, -0083 - Forgotten Temple, beside the toppled statue. 

**Solution:** 
1. In both rooms, Ultrahand the blocks to match the left-most structure. See the video for detailed instructions.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - In the 2nd room, on a pillar in the corner. Before completing the structure, make a climbable structure to reach it.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayausiy Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Sikukuu Shrine
locations.description:
_Spinning Gears_

**Location:** 0699, 2793, 0226 - In plain sight from [Thyphlo Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277406).  

**Solution:** 
1. When the ball falls, Rewind the gear so the ball falls near the socket. Place it inside to open the gate.
2. Rotate the lever clockwise, then Rewind it, using the giant cog to access the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Zonaite Longsword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281654) - After the first gate, rotate the lever counterclockwise instead. When Rewinded, the gear should push you down into a secret room with the chest.

locations.title: Nouda Shrine
locations.description:
_Proving Grounds: Intermediate_

**Location:** -2318, 2202, 0173 - [Kopeeki Drifts Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280387) - Beyond the freezing lake. Let the Ice Like freeze the pond underneath it, then Ultrahand the blocks back to the lake to create platforms. Alternatively, use Ice Fruits.

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the constructs, using only the gear provided in the room.

**Treasure:** 
- Hearty Elixir - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Nouda Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Oromuwak Shrine
locations.description:
_A Launching Device_

**Location:** -3079, 1617, 0243 - On top of the mountain ridge, surrounded by spikes. 

**Solution:** 
1. Place a Rocket in the groove, then activate it. It should launch itself into the target and open the door.
2. Attach a Rocket to the minecart. Then, jump in it and activate it to reach the higher ledge.
3. Repeat step 2, placing the minecart on the slope. This should propel the cart to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Ruby - In the 3rd room, on a high platform. Attach a Rocket to a minecart, pointing upwards, and activate it.

locations.title: Taki-Ihaban Shrine
locations.description:

**Location:** -1830, 1193, 0147 - [Lindor's Brow Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277702), on a high ledge beyond the Gloom Hands.

1. Walk up to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Taki Ihaban Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Oshozan-u Shrine
locations.description:
_Mallet Smash_

**Location:** -1404, 3677, 0288 - On top of an icy pinnacle. 

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the long stone mallet to the sliding platform. Then, Attach the rocket to the mallet, and activate it to launch it into the target.
2. Repeat step 1 in the next room to open the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Zonaite Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282418) - In the 2nd room, on a high ledge. Place a cylinder in the alcove, then climb it to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Kahatanaum Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Marakuguc Shrine
locations.description:
_Wheeled Wonders_

**Location:** 1761, 2508, 0473 - Above Goron City  

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the end of the bridge to the poles to cross the gap.
2. Attach the wheeled platform to the end of the bridge, then activate the wheels. The platform should roll past the gap and extend the bridge.
3. Attach both wheeled platforms together, then jump on them and activate the wheels to cross the large gap.
4. Ascend to the higher platform and defeat the construct.
5. Attach the grate to the front of the vehicule and activate it. This should push most balls on the pressure plate and open the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281652) -  On top of a pillar, in the corner of the final room. Use the grate as a ramp to climb on top of it.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Marakuguc Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kikakin Shrine
locations.description:
_Shining in Darkness_

**Location:** -0395, 2735, 0287 - On the mountain ridge 

**Solution:** 
1. Form the starting room, turn left, then right. Cross the crushing walls, then head at the end of the hallway.
2. Ultrahand the slab away to reveal the chest containing the Small Key,
3. Make your back to the starting the room and unlock the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Opal - In a small alcove. From the starting room, turn left twice; the alcove is just beyond the lasers.
- Amber - Behind a stone cube on the wall. From the starting room, turn right, the look on the right wall.
- Luminous Stone - Beyond some crushing walls. From the Small Key chest, turn left twice.
- Zonaite Bow - Above the ceiling. From the Small Key chest, past the crushing walls, look up for bright hole.

locations.title: Kurakat Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** 2366, -0514, 0156 - On a lone pillar, beside a tree. 

**Shrine Quest:** [Dyeing to Find It](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283429)

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Scepter](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283428) - Just before the end statue.

locations.title: Jogou Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** 3346, -1184, 0057 - [Lanayru Road East](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281188). In the circular area with a Bokoblin Boss patrolling, find the cracked wall on the center pillar. Destroy it, and enter a secret area. 

**Solution:** 
1. The puzzle here is actually finding the shrine.

**Treasure:** 
- Hearty Elixir - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jogou Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Mayam Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

locations.title: Turakawak Shrine
locations.description:
_Stacking a Path_

**Location:** -3496, -0197, 0066 - Down in Tabatha Frontier, on the shore of a lake, surrounded by thorns. 

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the block against the ledge, then climb it.
2. Once on the ledge, Attach both blocks vertically, and place them under the ladder to reach it.
3. Grab the first two blocks, and Attach them to the metal block, slightly offset.
4. Using the offset, Ascend through the blocks to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Rod](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282786) - In a locked room. From the first high ledge, look up and Ascend through the fenced ceiling. Ascend again to get out.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Turakawak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Ikatak Shrine
locations.description:

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ikatak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Iun-orok Shrine
locations.description:
_The Right Roll_

**Location:** -3538, 0853, -0133 - [Tanagar Canyon West Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278229) - At the far end of the cave, behind 3 thick cracked walls. 

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the ball on the slope so it rolls on the target.
2. Attach the two balls together, then place them on the angled slope. They should roll on both sides of the angle to the target.
3. Attach the three balls together, like a snowman. Ultrahand the snowman to the end of the curved slope, and drop it at the edge. It should fall and hit the target to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 10x Arrows - In the final room, on a high pillar. Slant the snowman against the pillar and jump from ball to ball to reach it.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Iun Orok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.description:

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Makurukis Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.description:

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Usazum Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Tsutsu-um Shrine
locations.description:
_The Stakes Guide You_

**Location:** ?? - On a small hill overlooking [Outskirt Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277792).  

**Solution:** 
1. Using Ultrahand, attach the platform to the pillar when it's at the bottom.
2. Climb on the platform and paraglide to the metal platform, using the fan to extend your air time.
3. Replace the 3 stakes as follows, so the giant ball goes into the hole:
    - In front of the ball's launching ramp, so it hits the stake and falls straight down.
    - Under the rotating platform, so it slants slightly downwards.
    - After the ball has fallen on the railing, on the rotating circle so it pushes the ball into the hole. 

**Treasure:** 
- 5x Arrows - On top of a pillar. When paragliding to the fan, take a sharp turn left on the pillar.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Tsutsu Um Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Gasas Shrine
locations.description:
_Well-Timed Cuts_

**Location:** -3079, 1617, 0243 - At the western end of Tabatha Canyon. 

**Solution:** 
1. Shoot the rope to drop the metal cube and make a platform to the other side.
2. Grab the first metal cube, and Attach it to the second to create a staircase to the higher ledge.
3. Attach both plates end-to-end to make a bridge to the other side.
4. Attach the metal cube to one end of the bridge to create a counterweight. Then, place the bridge in the western alcove.
5. Shoot the hanging chest on the bridge. Use the Small Key inside to open the door.
6. Using Ultrahand, swing the large ball side-to-side, and shoot the rope when the momentum is right. The ball should drop in the socket and open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - Before the Small Key door, hanging above the chasm. Place the bridge under it before shooting the rope.

locations.title: Kudanisar Shrine
locations.description:
_Bridging the Sands_

**Location:** -4168, -2140, 0050 - On top of the rock plateau 

**Solution:** 
1. Make your way to the ledge with the light ahead. Be mindful of your stamina, and take breaks on the flowing wooden platforms.
2. Attach 2 of these platforms to form a longer one, and use it to get past the fence.
3. Ultrahand the vertical board away, then destroy the construct hiding behind.
4. Repeat step 2 to get to the ladder, then press the pressure plate. This should launch a small ball to the other side of the room.
5. Paraglide to the lower ledge, and pilot a boat to the other side of the room. Ascend through the ledge and destroy the construct.
6. Attach the ball to one of the boats, then press the pressure plate to lower the gate. Pilot the boat back to first boat platform.
7. Attach boards end-to-end to create a ramp to the stairs. Drop the ball in the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Hasty Elixir - On top of a pillar, guarded by a construct. When piloting the sand boat, turn right to notice the pillar.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Kudanisar Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Mayamats Shrine
locations.description:
_A Route for a Ball_

**Location:** -4639, -1510, 0452 - On the edge of the cliff 

**Solution:** 
1. Glide to the higher ledge with the air flow.
2. Ascend to the ledge on the left and Ultrahand the ball down.
3. Place the ball in the V-shaped groove in the right wall, then Ascend through it.
4. Recall the smaller ball when it's just above the rail, then immediately cancel it; it should drop on the rail and into the basket.
5. Attach both balls together and place them on the rail in the first room. They should slide down, but not fall into the hole.
6. Dislodge the smaller ball into the socket to open the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - After first grabbing the ball, place it in the pit in front of the wind current. Use the ball as a platform to the ledge with the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayamats Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Otutsum Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** -4468, -0670, 0509 - In plain sight, between two mountain peaks.  

**Solution:** 
1. Walk to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Topaz - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Otutsum Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Rakashog Shrine
locations.description:
_A Reflective Device_

**Location:** -1713, -2120, -1149 - On a small, lonely island.

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the mirror by the door, and place it in the beam of light so it hits the hexagon. This should open the door.
2. In the next room, Ultrahand the mirror through the window in the bars. Hold it high in the beam of light, facing right, so it hits the hexagon and opens the door.
3. Before traversing, send the light beam through the door. On the other side, angle the mirror down so it hits the hexagon and activates the elevator.
4. Defeat both constructs. Then, use a mirror to reflect the light beam on either side of the stone slab. Use the other to reflect it on the hexagon, opening the door to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - After activating the elevator, place the mirror down so the light beam gets reflected upwards. Use the mirror on the upper platform to activate the hexagon and reach the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Rakashog Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Rotsumamu Shrine
locations.description:
_A Balanced Plan_

**Location:** -3405, -1365, 0335 - Beside the chasm, under a ledge. 

**Solution:** 
1. Run up the seesaw to the higher ledge.
2. Attach the metal barrel to the raised end of the seesaw, then use it to climb to the higher ledge.
3. Extend the raised end of the seesaw with the slab, and attach the metal cube to it. Then, grab a cube from the lowered end and place it on the other end. This should swap the seesaw and allow access to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonaite - Past the 3rd seesaw; place the slab to create a bridge and jump to the ledge with the chest.

locations.title: Ren-iz Shrine
locations.description:
_Jump the Gaps_

**Location:** 0756, 0823, 0082 - In the remains of a massive carved-out tree  

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the metal plate, and prop it against the top of the raised wall. It should be slanted slightly upwards.
2. Activate the pillar to drop a ball; it should roll down and hit your makeshift ramp to the hole. Adjust as necessary.
3. In the next room, Attach both metal plates together to form a giant L shape. Drop the L in front of the hole to form another ramp.
4. Activate the pillar to drop the ball and open the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Shield [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280424) - In the 2nd room, before forming the L shape, Attach both plates into a long bridge. Use it to reach the chest just right of the entrance.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ren Iz Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kyokugon Shrine
locations.description:
_Alignment of the Circles_

**Location:** -0710, -1550, 0006 - Inside [Great Plateau Foothill Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277823) (break through the large barrier of black stone)  

**Solution:** 
1. Place the 4 balls into the correct sockets. To identify them, look up to the ceiling.

**Treasure:** 
- Hearty Elixir - In the final room, use Ultrahand to notice a moveable slab in the floor, concealing a ball socket. Place a ball in it to open the door to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Kyokugon Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Jiukoum Shrine
locations.description:
_Built for Rails_

**Location:** On top of the mountain. 

**Solution:** 
1. Attach both plates together, then place them horizontally on the wide rails. Ride them to the next platform.
2. Attach the three square plates into a "U" shape. Place it upside down on the rails and ride it to the next platform.
3. Attach the plates here into an "E" shape. Then, place it on the rails so the top and bottom plates are within the rails. Finally, Attach a Fan above each plate, and activate them to ride your contraption to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Sticky Elixir - Before the second set of rails, on a high ledge. Attach the platforms into a ramp to the chest.

locations.title: Riogok Shrine
locations.description:
_Force Transfer_

**Location:** -1440, -1616, 0089 -   

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the pipe and attach it to the two cogs. Hit the crystal to open the gate.
2. After entering the next room, turn around and Rewing the cog. While Rewind is active, dislodge the pipe and bring it with you.
3. Ultrahand the pipe to the small lever, and move it to the left to open the gate.
4. Bring all 3 pipes to the higher platform, then Ascend to it.
5. One by one, Attach the pipes underneath the higher platform.
6. Once all 3 pipes are attached, Ascend to the higher platform to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Construct Bow [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280396) - In the 2nd room, on a high ledge. Using Ultrahand, attach 2 pipes together, then attach the chest to this long pipe and bring it to the ground.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Riogok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jojon Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Mayachideg Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Jochi-iu Shrine
locations.description:
_Courage to Pluck_

**Location:** 4346, 2875, 0165 - In plain sight, north of the road.  

**Solution:** 
1. Using Ultrahand, remove 2 metal blocks from the gigantic Jenga puzzle. Make sure the blocks you take do not unbalance the structure.
2. Use the metal blocks to close the circuit, powering the platform.
3. Ride the platform to reach the Ball, and grab it with Ultrahand.
4. Place the ball in the socket to open the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Zonaite Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281643) - On a high ledge. Use one of the metal blocks to create a ramp to it.
- Large Zonaite - Within the Jenga structure. Stand on the corner of the platform, and grab it with Ultrahand.

locations.title: Timawak Shrine
locations.description:
_Against the Flow_

**Location:** 1799, 1638, 0311 - On the side of the road, facing Goronbi Lake.  

**Solution:** 
1. Jump across the solidified lava to the other side, then destroy the construct.
2. Rewind a platform and ride it to the ball. When Rewind ends, return with the ball and place it in the socket.
3. In the next room, activate the fan and glide to the next platform. Drop a fountain down.
4. Activate the fountain to create a platform. Take it out of the lava and attach the fan to it.
5. Ride your makeshift boat to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281651) - In an alcove, beyond the ball. Ultrahand a freshly-made platform for a few seconds, then Rewind it and jump to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Isisim Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Taunhiy Shrine
locations.description:
**Location:** Near the pool on Courage Island.  You must first activate the shrine by touching the portal at the very top of the island, then dive through the rings that appear.  

**Puzzle Name:** Combat Training: Archery

**Solution:** 
1. Defeat the construct, following the on-screen prompts.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281458) - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Taunhiy Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Utsushok Shrine
locations.description:
_Long or Wide_

**Location:** 0673, -3357, 0071 - On top of the hill 

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand the slab up, then release it to smack the ball into the socket.
2. Attach the cube behind the slab, then repeat step 1.
3. Attach the metal slab behind the other to extend it, then repeat step 1. This should drop a minecart on the rails beside the slab.
4. Reattach the slab to the side, so it reaches the minecart.
5. Jump in the minecart, then repeat step 1 to propel the minecart to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Sneaky Elixir - On a platform, just before the end statue. Grab it with Ultrahand while travelling in the minecart. If you miss it, Recall the minecart.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Utsushok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Gemimik Shrine
locations.description:
_Turbine Power_

**Location:** 4513, 2116, 0001 - In the center of the spiral peninsula.  

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the turbine to the central device.
2. Complete the electrical circuit with the metal plate. Doing so should power up the turbine and create a wind current.
3. Paraglide all the way up the wind current, then head to the top-left corner. Throw down a Flame Emitter.
4. Break the circuit to stop the turbine. Then, Attach the Flame Emitter to it, and recomplete the circuit. Doing so should light all candles and open the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Zonaite Shield [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281642) - On a high ledge, in the top-right corner of the room. Glide to it from the top of the wind current.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Gemimik Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.description:

**Solution:** 
1. Walk up to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - Just before the end statue.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Igashuk Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Marari-in Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** 4632, -3712, 0018 - [Eventide Island Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282067), in an alcove high above the water. Build a bridge from the Boards on the upper deck of the boat. Requires advancing [Seeking the Pirate Hideout](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276930) until the boat arrives. 

**Solution:**

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Marari In Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Anedamimik Shrine
locations.description:
_A Retraced Path_

**Location:** 4235, -2174, -0012 - [Deepback Bay Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279761) - In the flooded moat. To access, drop down and destroy the cracked boulders behind the Like Like.

**Solution:** 
1. Wait for the ball to roll almost inside the pit, then Recall it.
2. While the ball Recalls, hit the crystal; this should place the socket in the ball Recall line and open the door to the end statue. 

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - After hitting the crystal, head right and Ascend through the platform to the chest.

locations.title: Jikais Shrine
locations.description:
_Jailbreak_

**Location:** 4268, -1671 ,0182 - On the side of the Lanayru Range 

**Solution:** 
1. Swap the positions of the two right blocks (the top block to the left, the bottom one to the right.
2. Ascend through the right block to the central ledge, then paraglide to the block on the left.
3. Move the block above to the right, then Ascend twice to reach the top.
4. Place the slab horizontally, slightly offset to the right under the taller pillar. Ascend through it.
5. Grab the slab through the bars, and place it horizontally on a corner of the jail. Ascend through it and to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Staff](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283075) - In the 2nd room, on a platform right of the entrance. Ascend to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jikais Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Susub Shrine

locations.title: Joju-u-u Shrine
locations.description:
_Building Bridges_

**Location:**
- Coordinates: 1516, -3576, 0142
- On a cliff overlooking the stable

**Solution:** 
1. Reattach the broken bridge to reach the next ledge.
2. Drop down, and Attach the third panel from the end to the pillar. The bridge should be taut enough to reach the next platform.
3. Attach the metal cube to the last panel of the bridge, then Ultrahand it over the beam. Climb back up and walk the bridge to the next platform.
4. Walk the bridge to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonaite: On a high platform beside the last bridge. Ultrahand the middle panel and Attach it to the plate on the side.

locations.title: Ekochiu Shrine
locations.description:
_Rise and Fall_

**Location:** 1062, 1279, 0045 - Out in the open, south of the Great Hyrule Forest. 

**Solution:** 
1. Step on the pressure plate until the platform moves to the other side, then step off.
2. Jump on the platform, then Recall it to reach the other side.
3. Jump on the grated cube, then Recall it up the waterfall.
4. Place the grated cube on the launch pad, then step on the pressure plate to launch it in the air.
5. After it falls down, jump on the cube and Recall it. When it is back to its highest point, paraglide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279492) - In the 2nd room, on top of a pillar. Before Recalling the grated cube, move it to the right and open the chest.

locations.title: Tadarok Shrine
locations.description:
_Fire and Water_

**Location:** Inside [River of the Dead Waterfall Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278223) 

**Solution:** 
1. Using Ultrahand, attach the block to the balls in the water and place them on the opposite side. Swim across to the next room.
2. Block the fire melting the ice block by using the stone block.
3. Drop the ice block into the lava to create a bridge.
4. Pull the wood block out of the fire and drop it in the water to put it out. Take it back to the main room.
5. Grab another ice block and drop it in the water under the ledge with the fire. Be sure to pull out the electricity ball from the water.
6. Attach the stone block from the first room, the block from the main room and the wood block to create a pillar. Make sure the wood block is NOT on the bottom.
7. Place your block pillar on the ledge above the ice block. Jump onto the ice block and use Ascend to get up.

**Treasure:** 
- Mighty Zonaite Shield

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Tadarok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Kamatukis Shrine
locations.description:
_A Precise Strike_

**Location:** 3430, 3356, 0071 - On the eastern shore of Skull Lake  

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the metal block to the center of the pillar above.
2. Using Ultrahand, pull the contraption backwards. When released, it should hit the Ball into the socket.
3. Aim slightly left to avoid the hill. If you miss, hit the crystal to respawn the ball.
4. Go to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Zonai Longsword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281645) - Repeat the above steps in the side room, this time lining your swing with the moving target.

locations.title: Domizuin Shrine
locations.description:
_A Prone Pathway_

**Location:** 3305, 1443, 0426 - Overlooks the [South Akkala Plains Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281648)  

**Solution:** 
1. Ascend through the column to the higher ledge.
2. Strike the crystal to rotate the structure and align the door.
3. Once in the room, pivot it so the large column is in the far right corner, with the gap at the bottom.
4. Ascend through the column to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 10x Arrows - After entering the large room, Ascend through the column to the right.
- Zonai Charge - After entering the large room, rotate it twice. The chest is on the now accessible ledge.
- [Strong Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281649) - After grabbing the above Zonai Charge, head to the chest by the initial entrance. Shoot the crystal to rotate the room and fall on the pillar.

locations.title: Siwakama Shrine
locations.description:
_Moving the Spheres_

**Location:** -2445, -3345, 0041 - On top of the sandy pillar.  

**Solution:** 
1. Place the large ball in the middle of the gap, and use it as a platform to cross.
2. Attach both balls together, and place them horizontally on the angled slope. They should remain stable enough for you to cross and access the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Bomb Flower x5 - In the 2nd room, under the starting platform. Drop a ball on the ramp, right of the platform; it should shatter the wall blocking the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Siwakama Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Chichim Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:**
- Coordinates: -3211, -3008, -0049
- Inside [Ancient Prison Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281621).
- After falling into the sinkhole, head straight and Ultrahand the first gate lever. Through the gate, follow the prison hallway until you reach a Gerudo statue holding up a weapon; it's pointing towards the correct path. Go under the partially opened gate towards another Ultrahand lever. Turn right and fall into the under-cell floor. Crouch through a gap in the stone wall and look for a sand and rumble ramp up to a cell. In the cell, walk forward onto the loose floor tiles and descend into a new under-cell area. Follow the Gerudo Statue's direction forward to the lit gate. Standing in front of the gate, Ascend up through the cell floor. In the new cell, use Ultrahand to move the two stone slabs to reveal a lever. Use Ultrahand to pull the lever and open the door leading to the Shrine.

**Solution:** 
1. Walk to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Zonaite Spear](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282873): Just before the end statue.

locations.title: Rakakudaj Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** -2038, 1850, 0065 - Ground level by the river, on a small outcrop 

**Shrine Quest:** [The Gerudo Canyon Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279622)

**Treasure:**

locations.title: Kitawak Shrine
locations.description:
_Upward and Forward_

**Location:** -1529, -2928, 0321 -  Atop the East Gerudo Mesa

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the stone slab at the end of the other to drop them and cross the gap.
2. Dislodge the slab, and attach it at the end of the other one ahead; they should fall towards Link.
3. Attach the other slab at the end to complete the ramp.
4. Dislodge the top slab, and Attach it at the end of the other.
5. Stand at the end of the slab and shoot the crystal; this should propel Link upwards. Glide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- 10x Arrows - After crossing the first bridge, Attach the first slab to the moving cog. Use it as a platform to reach the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Kitawak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Karahatag Shrine
locations.description:
_Drifting Flame_

**Location:** -3730, -3624, 0043 - In the middle of the oasis. 

**Solution:** 
1. Light up the upside-down candle left of the door. You may light the Torch on the floor and throw it.
2. Ultrahand the candle, and move it above each white tile, stopping a little every time. Then, bring it to the pressure plate.
3. Press on the pressure plate; this should lower the floor and reveal the upside down candles.
4. Recall your candle; it should fly back and light the 3 upside down candles.
5. Walk to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282827) - In the 2nd room, underneath the pressure plate. Jump down and paraglide back to access.
