locations.title: Makasura Shrine
locations.description:
_An Upright Device_

**Location:** 1775, -1055, 0166 - On a small hill. 

**Solution:** 
1. Ascend to the higher ledge.
2. Activate the nearby contraption to make it stand upright. Ascend through it and glide to the next ledge.
3. Place the contraption near the bars and activate it. Ascend through and glide over the bars.
4. Attach the Stabilizer to the metal structure. Then, place the ball into the bowl and activate the Stabilizer; it should launch the ball over the bars and into the socket.
5. Attach the now-available structure at the top of the first contraption. Then, jump in the bowl and activate it to launch Link to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Fairy Tonic - On a high ledge, in the room with the ball. After launching it, grab the device and place it beside the ledge. Climb it to reach the ches.t

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Makasura Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Sitsum Shrine
locations.description:
_A Controlling Device_

**Location:** 2369, 2595, 0790 - Just below the upper train platform on Death Mountain  

**Solution:** 
1. Drive the vehicule into the lava. At the crossroads, turn left.
2. Destroy the construct.
3. Dislodge the controller and Attach it to the nearby Wing.
4. Ride the Wing to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281650) - At the crossroads, turn right instead. Attach the ball to the vehicule, and place it into the socket to open the gate.

locations.title: Sepapa Shrine
locations.description:
_Backtrack_

**Location:** 0222, 1086, 0028 - Behind a small hill, just east of Hyrule Castle.  

**Solution:** 
1. Rewind the moving platform to lift you up the ledge.
2. Light both candles flanking the door to open it.
    - If you can't make fire, take the torch beside the door, and ride the wooden raft. On the other side, Rewind it, and light the torch on the your way back.
3. Using Ultrahand, place the ball in the closest hole. Wait a few seconds, then place it in the second hole.
4. Cross the first gate, then Rewind the ball. Doing so should close the first gate and open the second to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280438) - Up a wooden platform, in the 2nd room. While crossing the water on the raft, light your torch and burn away the vines to drop the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Sepapa Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Serutabomac Shrine
locations.description:
_The Way Up_

**Location:** -0179, 1170, 0280 - Hyrule Castle B1  

**Solution:** 
1. Place the metal plate on the two supporting beams, then Ascend through it to reach the ledge.
2. Attach the metal plates in an L shape, then prop the structure against the support beam. Ascend through the structure to the higher ledge.
3. Place a square plate on the ground. On either side, Attach another plate vertically, then rotate it so the longer plate is on the ground. 
4. Place the structure on the supporting beams. You should be able to Ascend twice to the final ledge.

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Rod [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280442) - In the 3rd room. Attach the metal plates so it forms a bridge-like structure. Then, rotate it on its side and prop it against the wall, on the spiked floor. Jump on the plate and Ascend to the ledge with the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Serutabomac Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

**Location:** 2568, 1247, 0173 - On a plateau, overlooking [Foothill Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278277) 

**Solution:** 
1. Attach both Fans to opposite sides of the giant spinning wheel in the center of the room; doing so should power all the turbines around it.
2. Walk to the end statue.

**Treasure:**

locations.title: Kadaunar Shrine
locations.description:
_Water Makes a Wat_

**Location:** 1882, 1202, 1251 - On the main island of South Eldin Sky Archipelago (reachable via the train rails) 

**Solution:** 
1. Activate the hydrant to create a block of cooled lava, then Ultrahand it away. Do it until you have 4 blocks and Attach them together into a bridge to cross the gap.
2. Destroy the cracked blocks using any hammer-type weapon. If you don't have any, Fuse a lava block with the nearby Rusty Claymore.
3. Bring your bridge in the next room, and use it to reach the end statue. You can always extend it by adding more lava blocks.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279495) - On a high ledge, past the first gap. Use your bridge to reach it as a ramp.

locations.title: Mayak Shrine
locations.description:
_Timely Catches_

**Location:** 1269, 3733, 0105 - In the open, near the edge of the cliff 

**Solution:** 
1. Jump on the pillar to the left to launch Link to the next ledge.
2. Place the ball on the slide. While it is sliding, jump back on the first platform.
3. Just when the ball falls off the slide, hit the crystal, This should move the target right underneath the ball and open the door to the next room.
4. Repeat steps 1 to 3, timing the crystal for when the ball comes into view.
5. Walk up to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - In the 2nd room, dangling from a rope. While falling down, shoot the rope to drop the chest in a pool of water below.

locations.title: Rasiwak Shrine
locations.description:
_Flotational Brilliance_

**Location:** 4663, 3263, 0001 - On the beach, in plain sight.  

**Solution:** 
1. Shoot an arrow through the rope to drop the platform into the water.
2. Using Ultrahand, attach the floating ball to the platform to raise it, allowing Link to cross the water.
3. Dislodge the floating ball and move it under the stone slab; this should rise it, making a ramp to access the following ledge.
4. Build a makeshift raft by Attaching both a floating ball and a fan to the stone slab. Step on it, and activate the fan to move the boat to the end platform.

**Treasure:** 
- [Magic Scepter](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281647) - In the final room, at the bottom of the pool. Attach a floating ball to it to get it out of the water.

locations.title: Yansamin Shrine
locations.description:
_Proving Grounds: Low Gravity_

**Solution:**

locations.title: Mayasiar Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** -3485, 0320, 1932 - Inside the Skyview Island. 

**Solution:** _Note: This is the solution to make the shrine appear_
1. Pivot the central gear until the light reflects off a mirror, on the side of the island.
2. Follow the beam of light until it stops, pivoting mirrors as needed so the light beam always hits another mirror.
3. Continue the chain until it hits the glowing hexagon in the center of the island.

**Treasure:** 
- [Star-Fragment Staff](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283452) - Just before the end statue.

locations.title: Tenbez Shrine
locations.description:
_Gravity and Velocity_

**Location:** -0972, 2525, 1011 - On the entrance platform of the North Lomei Castle Top Floor.

**Solution:** 
1. Wait for the ball to be in the right launcher, then hit the switch. This should reverse the gravity and guide the ball to the target.
2. Using the left launcher, launch Link to the next room. Wait for the ball to respawn and be launched through the doorway into the basket.
3. Let the ball be launched in the air, then hit the crystal as the ball flies over the target. This should open the way to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - In an alcove, underneath the target. Paraglide from the 2nd room to the chest.

locations.title: Ga-ahisas Shrine
locations.description:
_Rauru's Blessing_

**Location:** -3595, 0957, 1699 - On Lightcast Island, in the center. 

**Solution:** _Note: The following solution is to make the shrine appear_
1. Activate the [Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283450) to drain the water in the center of the island.
2. Enter the central pillar and destroy the cracked wall.
3. Once inside, grab the mirror with Ultrahand. Hold it horizontally within the light beam, then sweep the room to find another mirror. Drop the mirror, then go to the new one.
4. Repeat step 3 until you find a glowing hexagon; illuminate it to lower the island's center.
5. Take the steps down to the shrine.

**Treasure:** 
- Star Fragment - Just before the end statue.

**Solution:** 
1. Approach the end statue; it will pivot and fly away from Link.
2. Using the nearby Fire Fruits, light up the two unlit candles on the structure; this should move the chest platform and reveal a launch pad.
3. Use the launch pad and glide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Construct Bow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283453) - In the center of the platform.

locations.title: Mayanas Shrine
locations.description:
_The Ice Guides You_

**Location:** 4611, -0945, 1789 - On top of Valor Island.

**Shrine Quest:** [The South Lanayru Sky Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284234)

**Solution:** 
1. Use the Frost Emitter to create blocks of ice out of the pond in the center.
2. Drop an ice block on the spiked ramp, timing the release to the ice block hits the moving target.
3. Walk through the gate to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284236) - Beyond the end statue, beyond a gate. Same solution as the first puzzle, but this time, place the metal slabs on the right side so the blocks get bounced to the left on the target.

locations.title: Jirutagumac Shrine
locations.description:
_A Flying Device_

**Location:** 2911, 0525, 0929 - Inside the spinning sphere. From a higher island, time your jump and glide down through the sphere's opening. Hit the Zone device inside to stop the sphere's spinning. 

**Solution:** 
1. Place a Wing on the launch rail, and ride it to the left-most platform (step on the left wing to control it).
2. Attach a Sled underneath the Wing, then ride it to the right-most platform.
3. Attach a Fan behind the Wing, then jump on it and activate it, facing the end statue. This should fly across the room to it.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonaite - On a platform, high above the right-most platform. Before attaching the Fan, place the Wing between the two platforms, as a bridge. Step on it and Ascend to the chest.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jirutagumac Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Igoshon Shrine
locations.description:
_Orbs of Water_

**Location:** 3480, 0667, 1325 - High on an island, up a waterfall. 

**Solution:** 
1. Stand on top of the plate, and swim in the floating orb to reach the higher ledge.
2. Stand inside the water orb in the far right corner, and Recall it to the higher ledge.
3. Enter the moving orb and swim to the next platform.
4. Attach the slab to the moving platform to form a launch ramp, and move it in the path of the orb. Ride the orb to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - Falling repeatedly, left of the higher ledge. Ultrahand an orb in its path to catch the chest and bring it to the ledge.

locations.title: Mogisari Shrine
locations.description:
_Courage to Jump_

**Location:** 4656, 3456, 1010 - In front of the Lomey Sky Labyrinth 

**Solution:** 
1. Glide to the lower ledge, then pilot the left vehicle over the right ramp.
2. Staying on the vehicle, pilot over the lava, the spikes and the beams.
3. After the beams, turn right until you see the Rockets. Destroy the construct there.
4. Attach two Rockets to your vehicle and use them to cross the giant gap.
5. Ride in style to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Mighty Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283445) - After the beams, turn left instead and ram into the dark blocks, breaking them. The chest is behind them.

locations.title: Apogek Shrine
locations.description:
_Wings on the Wind_

**Location:** 3885, -0214, 0164 - Under a rocky overhang, above Lanayru Bay.

**Solution:** 
1. Ultrahand one of the floating Wings. Then, Attach the ball to it, and use the launch rail to glide it to the lower platgorm.
2. Glide to the lower platform, and place the ball in the socket to open the door.
3. In the next room, glide up the Fan to the higher ledge, then grab both Fans from the lower level.
4. Attach both Fans to a Wing, then launch it on the rails and ride it to the end statue.S

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Spear](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283431) - In the 2nd room, on a tall pillar. After gliding up, Ultrahand the Fan just underneath the pillar and glide to the top.

locations.title: Gatanisis Shrine
locations.description:
_A Well-Timed Bounce_

**Location:** 4497, 0830, 0095 - Below, on the ledge  

**Solution:** 
1. Wait for the ball to fall on the bouncing platform. When it reaches the mid-point, use Rewind on the platform, which should bounce the ball on the target. Adjust timing accordingly.
2. Repeat the process, this time standing on the smaller side platform. This should launch Link upwards; glide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Bomb Flower x5 - Ascend through the target to access the chest.

_Alignment_

**Location:** 2401, 3280, 0402 - Amidst the rocky cliffs. 

**Solution:** 
1. Recall the 2nd second rotating cylinder. When the pillar is aligned with the bottom one, stop the Recall.
2. Repeat step 1 for each cylinder, aligning them into a single tall pillar.
3. Ascend through the pillar to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- [Strong Zonaite Longsword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283435) - After aligning the first 2 pillars, Ascend through and glide to the chest, in an alcove in the pillar.

locations.title: Musanokir Shrine
locations.description:
_Swing to Hit_

**Location:** 0417, 2127, 0143 - Just south of the Great Deku Tree

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the metal ball to the side of the cube and walk across the raised slab.
2. Attach the metal cube to the hanging ball. Then, raise it away from the target and let it swing.
3. Attach the cylinder at the front of the slab, and the metal cube to the ball underneath. Then, swing the cube backwards to propel the slab forward and hit the target.
4. Walk to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Large Zonai Charge - On a raised platform, in the final room. Use the cylinder as a bridge to get on the slab, then glide to the chest.

locations.description:
_Lever Power_

**Location:** -4059, 1990, 0183 - [West Lake Totori Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279660)  - At the end of the cave.

**Shrine Quest:** [The White Bird's Guidance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283119)

**Solution:** 
1. Attach the bowl to the closest end of the rotating slab.
2. Place the ball into bowl. Then, Ultrahand the cube high above the farthest end of the slab and drop it. This should launch the ball on the lower target.
    - Adjust as needed. Dropping the cube from higher up or closer to the end of the slab should launch the ball further.
3. Grab the Board from the now open alcove, and extend your catapult. Repeat step 2 until you hit the higher target.
4. Instead of launching the ball, launch Link in the air and paraglide to the end statue.

**Treasure:** 
- Spicy Elixir - On a platform, high against the eastern wall. When launching Link, guickly paraglide right to the chest.

**Location:** On the Gerudo Highlands; entrance inaccessible 

**Associated Region:** Gerudo Highlands  

**How To Unlock:** Go into [Meadela's Mantle Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280596), travel down stream on a raft. Once past waterfall, place another raft und the support structures and Ascend through the center. This will take you inside the tower which has been snowed in.

**Coordinates:** -3972, -1250, 0429

locations.title: Gerudo Secret Club
locations.description:
_Shop does not appear on Purah Pad map._

**Location:** Drop down into the [Secret Shop Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279712) cave, and turn left at the cracked rock wall. Break apart the rocks, and continue pushing forward through the rock-blocked tunnel until you reach white stone pillars. Ascend through the roof, right into the Gerudo Secret Club armor shop.

For future shopping, make sure to unlock the [door shortcut](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284930) that leads into an alley of Gerudo Town.

**Stock:**
- [Snow Boots](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284635) — 1,300 Rupees
- [Sand Boots](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284634) — 1,200 Rupees
- [Desert Voe Spaulder](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279713) — 1,300 Rupees
- [Desert Voe Trousers](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279714) — 650

locations.title: Hestu
locations.description:
You must find Hestu's [first location](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279556) and complete [Hestu's Concerns](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277028) to unlock his services.

He will sometimes move locations, based on a hint:
- "Somewhere with lots of people" — Lookout Landing (Here)
- "Some place to rest" — Korok Forest

locations.title: Hestu
locations.description:
This is Hestu's FIRST location. After completing [Hestu's Concerns](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277028) and getting your first inventory upgrade, he will switch locations based on a hint.
- "Somewhere with lots of people" — [Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277027)
- "Some place to rest" — [Korok Forest](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280173)

locations.title: Koltin
locations.description:
**Required:** Complete [The Search For Koltin](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277851)

Koltin sells only ONE item at a time, and his shop offerings follow a fixed sequence:
1. [Bokoblin Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280937) — 1 Bubbul Gem
2. [Moblin Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280938) — 2 Bubbul Gems
3. 3x Hinox Toenails — 2 Bubbul Gems
4. [Mystic Robe](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280939) — 3 Bubbul Gems
5. 8x Fire Keese Eyeballs — 3 Bubbul Gems
6. [Lizalfos Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280940) — 3 Bubbul Gems
7. 5x Ice-Breath Lizalfos Tail — 3 Bubbul Gems
8. [Mystic Trousers](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281131) — 4 Bubbul Gems
9. White-Maned Lynel Mace Horn — 4 Bubbul Gems
10. [Horriblin Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281133) — 4 Bubbul Gems
11. 2x Gleeok Wing — 4 Bubbul Gems
12. [Lynel Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281135) — 4 Bubbul Gems
13. 3x Gleeok Thunder Horn — 4 Bubbul Gems
14. [Mystic Headpiece](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281132) — 5 Bubbul Gems
15. [Koltin's Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284883) — 101 remaining Bubbul Gems

locations.title: Take the Plushies Back
locations.description:
**Mini Game**
**Objective:** Pay 20 Rupies. Use your ultrahand to gather the seal plushies and get them back into the cart with 1:30. 

**Rewards**
* 1-4 Plushies: No Reward
* 5-9 Plushies: 20 Rupies (You get your deposit back)
* 10 Plushies: 50 Rupies

**Tip:** Fuse them all together with the ultrahand rather than loading them one at a time. Then load them all at once.

locations.title: Master Sword
locations.description:
**Location:** Found lodged in the head of the [Light Dragon](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278304). 

To remove the sword you'll need 2 Green Stamina wheels (bonus stamina from meals won't count)

**Note:** The Master Sword will be marked on your map after completing either:
- [The Dragon's Tears](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276887)
- [Trail of the Master Sword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=287479)

media.title: How To Get The Master Sword In Tears Of The Kingdom

locations.description:
On the ground, there's a mound of cracked rock. Break through the rock until you can access a Hyrule Castle room below. The fabric is inside a chest in the center.

Warning: There's a dangerous enemy lurking beneath the rocks!

locations.title: Monster-Control-Crew Fabric
locations.description:
**Required:** Help all three squads of the Monster-Control Crew.

Hoz's Squad:
- [Bring peace to Hyrule Field!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278109)
- [Bring peace to Necluda!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280745)

Toren's Squad
-  [Bring peace to Eldin!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284438)
- [Bring peace to Akkala!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282619)

Flaxel's Squad:
- [Bring peace to Faron!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282430)
- [Bring peace to Hebra!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283065)

It is not required to finish the 6 quests in the same blood-moon cycle. However, each squad will reset to the first quest after a blood-moon.

Talk with the [Great Deku Tree](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281018) after.

locations.description: **How to get:** Automatically obtained through the main quest.

locations.title: The North Hyrule Sky Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Mayam Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277775)  

**Solution:** 
- Defeat the [Flux Construct I](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277777) on the sky island to the south and retrieve the crystal

locations.title: The Oakle's Navel Cave Crystal
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside [Oakle's Navel Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278116)

**Associated Shrine:** [Tokiy Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278119)

**Solution:** Following the green beam of light, bring the crystal to the shrine, avoiding the rolling boulders.

locations.title: The North Necluda Sky Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Josiu Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278329)  

**Solution:** 
- Bring the [North Necluda Sky Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284237) back to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Josiu Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Gerudo Canyon Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Rakakudaj Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278152)  

**Solution:** 
- Return the [Gerudo Canyon Shrine Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279625)

locations.title: The Lake Hylia Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [En-oma Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278371)  

**Solution:** Drop the [Lake Hylia Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283046) down the hole, then through the whirlpool and to the shrine.

locations.title: The Death Caldera Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Momosik Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278218)  

**Solution:** Inside [Death Mountain East Tunnel](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278221). Get on the minecart, and ride the rail until you reach the Igneo Talus waiting in the ground. Defeat it and bring the crystal back to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Momosik Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Rock For Sale
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Activate [Jochi-ihiga Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278375), then follow the green beam to Ruli in [Tarrey Town](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278088).

**Solution:** After haggling the price for a bit, Ruli finally offers the mysterious glowing crystal for 50 Rupees. Pick up or use Ultrahand to transport your newly purchased Crystal to  [Jochi-ihiga Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278375).

**Reward:**
- Unlocks: [Jochi-ihiga Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278375)

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jochi Ihiga Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Gisa Crater Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Ikatak Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277787)

**Solution:** Follow the green light to the [Gisa Crater Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=286062) in [Gisa Crater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278230) to the south. Use the nearby Rockets to propel the stone out of the crater.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ikatak Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Satori Mountain Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Usazum Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277790)

**Solution:** Defeat the Hinox in [Satori Mountain Foothill Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277791) and bring back the crystal to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Usazum Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Ralis Channel Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Joniu Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278644)

**Solution:** Build a vehicle that can carry Link and the [Ralis Channel Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283432) upstream. Follow the river north and deliver the crystal to the shrine.

locations.title: The South Hyrule Sky Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Jinodok Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278351)  

**Solution:** 
- Return the [South Hyrule Sky Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281925) from the island to the north-west

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Jinodok Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The East Hebra Sky Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Taninoud Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278355)

**Solution:** 
- Using the nearby platform and Fans, head to the [East Hebra Sky Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283443), then bring it back to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Taninoud Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Lake Intenoch Cave Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Moshapin Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278869)

**Location:** [Lake Intenoch Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282018) - Beyond a cracked wall, just right of the entrance.  Grab the Hydrant lying left of the crystal, and use it to cool the lava into a bridge up to the shrine.

locations.title: The High Spring and the Light Rings
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Zakusu Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277954)  

**Solution:** Activate this terminal, then surf down the ledge and on the mountain. Surf through all the rings within the time limit. You can use the Sled Shield near the terminal to make it easier.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Zakusu Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The North Hebra Mountain Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Sisuran Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278368)  

**Solution:** Defeat the [Frost Talus](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280975) and bring his crystal back to the shrine.

locations.title: The Northwest Hebra Cave Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Rutafu-um Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278369)  

**Solution:** Bring the crystal from the bottom of the freezing pond within the cave. Attach an Icicle to a rock, then quickly attach it to the crystal, which should rise. You can then grab it with Ultrahand to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Rutafu Um Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Ride the Giant Horse
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Ishokin Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278370)  

**Solution:** Ride the [Giant Horse](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283044) and bring it back to Baddek. Then bring the Shrine Crystal to the shrine down the hill.

media.title: Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom How To Tame The Giant Horse

locations.title: Keys Born of Water
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Jochisiu Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278372); Speak with the Steward Construct by the stone structure. 

**Solution:** Using the nearby Frost Emitter or Ice Fruit arrows, create 3 ice platforms from the lake. Then, place each platform in the diamond-shaped slots on the pillars, melting the platforms to fit each slot size.

locations.title: Legend of the Soaring Spear
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Utojis Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278125)

**Solution:** Read the journal found at the bottom of [Toblo's Hollow Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281959) to start the quest. Pick up one of the nearby Zonaite Spears and fuse a Keese Wing to it. Then, step on the platform and throw the spear into the glowing circle.

**Coordinates:** 1206, -2490. 0096

locations.title: The Lanayru Road Crystal
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [O-ogim Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277953)  

**Solution:** Bring the [Lanayru Road Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283079) back to the shrine. You may use the nearby ramp to launch a Wing to the shrine.

locations.title: The White Bird's Guidance
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Wao-os Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278382)

**Solution:** 
- Stand on top of Vah Medoh's perch between 5-7am and look to the West.  As the sun rises, Vah Medoh's perch will cast a shadow and align under a patch of snow in the shape of a bird.  Glide over to that location and you will find the West Lake Totori Cave entrance.  Travel through the cave to find the Wao-os Shrine and complete the quest!

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Wao Os Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Dyeing to Find It
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Kurakat Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277763)  

**Solution:** 
- Talk to the Steward Construct to start the quest.
- Look on the other side of the gap to see a white pattern on the rock face. The pattern resembles the shape of the stone column on your side of the gap.
- The objective is to alter the shape of the column's shadow so that when it falls on the white pattern it has roughly the same shape.
- You can change the shape of the column's shadow by using some combination of turning it using the wheel nearby and/or attaching one or two boards to it.
- Wait until morning. At approximately 6:00 AM the column's shadow will fall on the white pattern. If it has roughly the same shape, the shrine will appear.

locations.title: A Pretty Stone and Five Golden Apples
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Pupunke Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278379)  

**Solution:** Bring Dania five Golden Apples. If you don't have them, you may follow the path to [Mido Swamp](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277402), where two Golden Apple trees hold 6 apples in total. Then, bring the crystal to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Pupunke Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: None Shall Pass?
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Sakunbomar Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278380)  

**Solution:** Destroy the [Stone Talus](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282023), then bring its crystal back to the shrine.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Sakunbomar Shrine Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.description:

locations.description:

**Solution:** 
- Use the nearby launcher to reach the [Sokkala Sky Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283449). Then, using the device inside, pivot the opening back towards the shrine and send the crystal to it.

locations.title: Potential Princess Sightings
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to [Traysi](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277845) in the [Lucky Clover Gazette](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276842) headquarters.  

Kickoff Link's career as a journalist! Your first news assignment is investigating possible sightings of the missing Princess Zelda.

Starting this will unlock additional Side Adventures across Hyrule:
- [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)
- [The Beast and the Princess](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280074)
- [White Goats Gone Missing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280075)
- [Zelda's Golden Horse](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280101)
- [An Eerie Voice](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280110)
- [The Beckoning Woman](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280366)
- [The All-Clucking Cucco](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280392)
- [Gourmets Gone Missing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281249)
- [The Missing Farm Tools](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281257)
- [Princess Zelda Kidnapped?!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282177)
- [For Our Princess!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280509)
- [The Blocked Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282420)

Note: Rewards for these additional Side Adventures are based on your "base pay" as a journalist. Each completed Side Adventure for the Gazette will increase compensation, starting at 50 Rupees.

**Reward:** 
- [Lucky Clover Gazette](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282907) (Paraglider Fabric)
- [Froggy Hood](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277847)
- [Froggy Sleeve](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281121)
- [Froggy Leggings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281122)

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

**Next Side Adventure:** [The Mayoral Election](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282891)

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom A New Signature Food Gameplay Walkthrough Side Adventure

locations.title: Serenade to a Great Fairy
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Begin [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846), then meet up with Penn at [Woodland Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279491)

A musical troupe called [The Stable Trotters](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279499) claim they've seen a blonde girl shut herself inside a flower bud. Penn suspects this might be Princess Zelda. Perhaps the flower bud will open if the blonde woman hears music?

You need to bring The Stable Trotters to the [Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279490) flower bud. But, to do that, you must first repair their cart and find a horse to pull it.

**Reward:** Rupees, amount depends on your "base pay" for the Lucky Clover Gazette

**Next Side Adventure:**
- [Serenade to Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279990)
- [Serenade to Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)
- [Serenade to Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280108)

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Serenade To A Great Fairy Gameplay Walkthrough Side Adventure

locations.title: Serenade to Cotera
locations.description:
**How To Begin:**
1. Complete [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983) & [Honey, Bee Mine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279476)
2. Speak with Mastro at the [Dueling Peaks Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279177) outdoor stage

The Stable Trotters are eager to play their music for Great Fairy Cotera, but they can't cross the bridge! Use Ultrahand to solve this transportation crisis.

After successfully crossing the river, guide the cart to Great Fairy Cotera.

**Reward:** 
- 100 Rupees
- Unlocks: [Great Fairy Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279483)

**Next Side Adventure:**
- [Serenade to Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)
- [Serenade to Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280108)

locations.title: Serenade to Mija
locations.description:
**How To Begin:**
1. Complete [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983) & [The Hornist's Dramatic Escape](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280076)
2. Speak with Mastro at the [Snowfield Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277694) outdoor stage

The Stable Trotters are eager to play music for Great Fairy Mija, but their wagon desperately needs a roof to withstand the harsh weather.

After improving the cart, hitch a horse with harness to the wagon and guide the troupe to the Great Fairy.

**Reward:**
- 100 Rupees
- Unlocks: [Great Fairy Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279257)

**Next Side Adventure:**

**Reward:** Rupees, amount depends on your "base pay" for the Lucky Clover Gazette

locations.title: The Hornist's Dramatic Escape
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Eustus, the hornist for The Stable Trotters

Eustus's wagon broke, leaving him stranded! Repair the wagon with Ultrahand and free the hornist from his purgatory.

Tip: You do not need to _safely_ land the wagon. The minute the wagon leaves the hole's perimeter, it will cut to Eustus and Link talking nearby.

**Reward:** 3x Courser Bee Honey

**Next Side Adventure:** [Serenade to Mika](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)

locations.title: Zelda's Golden Horse
locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)

**How To Begin:** Speak to Penn outside [Snowfield Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277694)

Princess Zelda's [golden horse](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282168) has escaped the stables! Maybe if Link follows its tracks, there will be clues about Princess Zelda's location?

**Reward:** Rupees, amount depends on your "base pay" for the Lucky Clover Gazette

locations.title: The Flute Player's Plan
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Climb up the tree and speak to Pyper, the Stable Trotter's flautist

Retrieve 10x Sunset Fireflies for Pyper, which can be found after midnight in forests. 

**Reward:** Big Hearty Truffle

**Next Side Adventure:** [Serenade to Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280108)

locations.title: Serenade to Kaysa
locations.description:
**How To Begin:**
1. Complete [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983) & [The Flute Player's Plan](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280107)
2. Speak with Mastro at the [Outskirt Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277792)

The Stable Trotters are larger to play their music for Great Fairy Kaysa, but their trusty wagon is in disrepair, and there doesn't seem to be the usual wagon wheels nearby.

Leaning against a boulder, there's a stone and Zonai tech cart you can repair. Use Ultrahand to put the missing wheel back, and attach the Zonai controller on top. Then, Place the Stable Trotter's wagon on top of the stone slab.

**Reward:**
- 100 Rupees
- Unlocks: [Great Fairy Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279489)

**Next Side Adventure:**
- [Serenade to Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279990)
- [Serenade to Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)

locations.description:

**How To Begin:** Talk to Kilton. 

**Reward:**
- Monster Extract
- Sneaky Monster Soup

**Next Side Adventure:** [A Monstrous Collection III](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282916)

**Reward:**

locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** [Bring Peace to Faron!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282430)  

**How To Begin:** Speak with Flaxel  

**Reward:**
- Silver Rupee
- [Monster-Control-Crew Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284645) (if all 6 _Bring Peace_ side adventures have been completed)

**Next Side Adventure:** None

locations.title: The Long Dragon
locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** [Investigate the Thyphlo Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281616)  

**How To Begin:** Investigate the right-most slab after obtaining [Vow of Riju](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279577)  

**Reward:** [Topaz x3 [Chest[](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=290438)

**Next Side Adventure:** ??

locations.title: The Six Dragons
locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** [Investigate the Thyphlo Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281616)  

**How To Begin:** Examine the 2rd right-most stone slab after obtaining [Vow of Sidon](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279575).

**Reward:** [Opal x5 [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=290437)

**Next Side Adventure:** None
