locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** [Investigate the Thyphlo Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281616)  

**How To Begin:** Examine the 2nd left-most stone slab after obtaining [Vow of Yunobo](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279573).  

**Reward:** [Ruby x3 [Chest]](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=289742)

**Next Side Adventure:** None

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom The Corridor Between Two Dragons Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Bring Peace To Eldin!
locations.description:
**Previous Side Adventure:** None  

**How To Begin:** Talk to Toren.  

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

**Next Side Adventure:** [Bring Peace to Akkala!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282619)

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Bring Peace To Eldin Gameplay Walkthrough Side Adventure

locations.title: Horse-Drawn Dreams
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [Zumi](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276879)  

**Solution:** First, Ultrahand two of the nearby wheels on the wagon to repair it. Then, you need to tame a wild horse to pull the cart. Wild horses can be found grazing east of the stables. Ride the horse back to Zumi.

**Reward:**
- Silver Rupee

locations.title: Teach Me A Lesson I
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Symin multiple times in [Hateno School](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276899) after the school day has begun (9:00 AM).

**Solution:** Go to [Kakariko Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276821) and head for Paya's House. Look for the tapestry on the 2nd floor and take a picture of it.

**Reward:** Hylian Rice x10

locations.title: Dantz's Prize Cows
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Dantz, who's pacing around outside [Hateno Pasture](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276895). He only needs three acorns.

**Reward:** Fresh Milk

locations.title: Seeking the Pirate Hideout
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Sesami (located by the red tent on Toronbo Beach) 

**Reward:** Blue-Maned Lynel Saber Horn

locations.title: Piaffe, Packed Away
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Piaffe inside the stable.  

**Solution:** Destroy all the boxes in the stable.  

**Reward:** 1x Pony Point

locations.title: A Picture For The Closed Stable I
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Examine the empty picture frame in front of Piaffe after completing [Piaffe, Packed Away](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276949)  

**Solution:** Head for [Rakashog Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277801). On the arm of the island that points southwest, look down and take a picture.

**Reward:** One Pony Point and some food.

locations.title: A Picture For The Closed Stable II
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Piaffe again after acquiring [A Picture For The Closed Stable I](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276950). It is not necessary to complete it to get the second quest.

**Solution:** The [Forgotten Sword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=286597) is right next to a [Frost Gleeok](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278165). A [Korok Seed](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280676) also marks the exact location.

**Reward:** One Pony Point and some food.

locations.title: The Incomplete Stable
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Karson, near the horses, after completing the [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570).  

**Objective:** Complete the stable by using Ultrahand to attach the nearby plank onto the roof

**Reward:** Unlocks the [Mini Stable at Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277031)

**Next Side Quest:** [Spotting Spot](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284885)

locations.title: Mired in Muck
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to [Bazz](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277046), who's stuck in the mud in front of [Upland Zorana Skyview Tower](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276831)  

**Steps To Complete:**
- Throw a Splash Fruit at him to free him from the mud (they can be found growing on the eastern side of the tower)

**Reward:** Zora Spear

locations.title: Today's Menu
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Burmano in the Emergency Shelter.  
**Solution:** Give him an Apple  
**Reward:** Fruit and Mushroom Mix

locations.title: Photographing a Chuchu
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Sayge in [Kochi Dye Shop](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276896)  

**How To Complete:** Use your camera to take a picture of a Chuchu

_Note: If this is your first time meeting Sayge, then you may need to speak to him, leave, then speak again and will need to customize the paraglider at least once for him to give you the Side Quest._

**Reward:** [Chuchu Design](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279956)

locations.title: The Treasure Hunters
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Talk to Domidak

**Reward:** 3 Flower Bombs

locations.title: The Great Tumbleweed Purge
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Barles at the small camp in the mountains.

**Task:** Destroy all the nearby Tumbleweeds

**Reward:** Royal Shield (55)

locations.title: Eldin's Colossal Fossil
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Loone on the path near East Akkala Stable  

**Solution:** 
- Find the [Eldin Great Skeleton](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278384)
- Replace the [Eldin Great Skeleton's Eye](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278385)
- Speak with Loone to complete the quest; she relocated [here](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278386)

**Reward:** Purple Rupee

**Next Side Quest:** [Hebra's Colossal Fossil](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278386)

locations.title: The Gathering Pirates
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Aya, outside the stable.  
**Solution:** Defeat all the pirates near the [North Akkala Beach](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277104).  
**Reward:**
- 2x Pony Point
- Endura Carrot

locations.title: Strongest in the World
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Chabi outside [East Akkala Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277827) 

**Task:** Bring a Lynel Horn to Chabi. You may used the marked [Lynel](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279233), or seek a stronger one for better rewards.

**Reward:**
- Purple, Silver or Gold Rupee, depending of the horn's quality.

locations.title: The Lomei Labyrinth Island Prophecy
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with the terminal at the center of the [Lomei Labyrinth Island](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278302).  

**Solution:**
- Reach the Lomei Sky Labyrinth, by the [Mogisari Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278365).
- Activate each of the four terminals within the Sky Labyrinth:
    - [NW Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280419)
    - [NE Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280415)
    - [SW Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280418)
    - [SE Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280417)
- A new terminal will spawn atop the labyrinth; interact with it to open the gate to the [Lomei Labyrinth Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278300); dive into it.
- Defeat the [Flux Construct III](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283117) to complete the quest.    

**Reward:** [Evil Spirit Armor](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280412)

locations.title: The Ancient City Gorondia!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Dugby beside the minecart railway  

**Solution:** Put his cart onto the mine track to the right and Attach a Fan to it. Speak with Dugby again, then ride the cart with him to YunoboHQ.  

**Reward:** Zonai Charge

locations.title: Hebra's Colossal Fossil
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Complete [Hebra's Colossal Fossil](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278386) and speak to Loone [here](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284462).

**Solution:** 
- Find the [Hebra Great Skeleton](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284462)
- Replace the fossil
- Speak with Loone to complete the quest; she relocated [here](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284462)

**Reward:** Purple Rupee

**Next Side Quest:** [Gerudo's Colossal Fossil](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284462)

locations.title: An Uninvited Guest
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Talk to Ami at [Wetland Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279178)

Clear the [Enemy Camp](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279473) outside the [Wetland Stable South Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279333). You can use the [Wetland Stable Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279331) nearby to use the passage underground and sneak up behind the enemies!

**Reward:** 2 Pony Points

locations.title: Out of the Inn
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Dai the Innkeeper at [Shuteye Inn](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276824)  

**Solution:** Find [Ollie](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284677), and bring him a Hearty Truffle. Some may be found in the nearby [Kakariko Village Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283291).  

**Reward:** Sticky Elixir

locations.title: Codgers' Quarrel
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Trissa the Shopkeeper at [High Spirits Produce](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276822)  

**Solution:** Clear the [Enemy Camp](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284672), then speak with [Olkin](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284671) or [Steen](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284670) to bring them back to the village.  

**Reward:** Endura Carrot

locations.title: A Trip through History
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Bugut, a traveling historian wandering up and down the central road in Kakariko Village  

**Solution:** Read the four following slabs:
1. [Deciphered Slabs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279752)
2. [Deciphered Slabs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280168)
3. [Deciphered Slabs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284525)
4. [Deciphered Slabs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284675)  

**Reward:** Thunderwing Butterfly x3

locations.title: Gloom-Borne Illness
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Lasli,  who typically sits by a [cooking pot](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279469)

Create a porridge to fight off the gloom that plagues Leslie's grandmother. 

Ingredients:
- Hylian Rice
- Fresh Milk
- "Wild Greens" (Sundelion)

**Reward:** 
- Energizing Veggie Porridge
- Discounted prices at [Enchanted](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276825)

locations.title: Meat For Meat
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Mezer.  

**Solution:** Bring the [Marbled Rock Roast](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284499) back to Mezer. Make sure you have some Fireproof Elixir to enter the cave, and use the Hydrants in the cave to walk across the lava.  

**Reward:** Large Zonai Charge

locations.title: Open the door
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Knock the door or examine the small hole through side of house. 

**Reward:** 
- Spicy Elixer
- Traveler's Shield
- Unlocks: Shield Surfing Instructions

locations.title: Disaster in Gerudo Canyon
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Quince by the ruins  
**Solution:** Find his 3 lost friends in Gerudo Canyon:
- [Giro](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279626)
- [Garill](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279611)
- [Botrick](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284627)
  
**Reward:** 10x Bomb Flower

locations.title: The Missing Owner
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Cara in the Gerudo hideout shelter or Gerudo Jewelry Shop.
   
**Solution:** 
1. Head West out of town towards [Toruma Dunes](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277303)
2. Defeat the Molduga.
3. Return to the city and speak with Cara.

**Reward:**
- Diamond
- Opens the Arms of the Seven

locations.title: Amber Dealer
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Ramella  

**Solution:** Bring her 10x Amber  

**Reward:**
- 200 Rupees
- [Ramella](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284498)'s ore trading service.

locations.title: Manny's Beloved
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Manny, who is hiding behind a pillar and staring at Ms. Ivee. Give him ten hot-footed frogs.

**Reward:** 10 Rushrooms

locations.title: Cave Mushrooms That Glow
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Meghyn or Nat near [Brightcap Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279994)  

**Solution:** Give the Meghyn and Nat 10x Brightcap. Enough may be found in the nearby [Brightcap Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279995) 

**Reward:** Spicy Tomato Mushroom Stew

locations.title: Genli's Home Cooking
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Genli after starting [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570). She can often be found inside [The Slippery Falcon](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276845) General Store.  

**Solution:** Give Genli a Staminoka Bass to enhance her cooking.  

**Reward:** Biting Simmered Fruit

locations.title: Molli the Fletcher's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Molli after starting [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570). She can be found inside her cliffside house in Rito Village.  

**Solution:** Give Molli an Ice Fruit or a White Chuchu Jelly.  

**Reward:** 10x Arrow

locations.title: Fell Into a Well!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Dillie, down the [Rebonae Bridge Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279330)  
**Solution:** Use Ultrahand to connect the broken part of the ladder on the ground, back to the ladder remaining above  
**Reward:** Purple Rupee

locations.title: Crossing the Cold Pool
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Verla at in front of the [Talonto Peak Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280046).  

**Solution:** Bring 10x Chillshroom to Verla. Enough can be gathered from the [Talonto Peak Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280047).  

**Reward:** 50 Rupees

locations.title: Teach me a Lesson II
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Symin after completing [Teach Me A Lesson I](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276905)  

**Solution:** Cook some Monster Curry using Hylian Rice, Goron Spice, and Monster Extract.

**Reward:** Unlocks the next side quest: [Uma's Garden](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284453)

locations.title: Where Are the Wells?
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Fera inside the [Wetland Stable Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279331) (see Note).  
**Solution:** Find all 58 wells. For a well to be "found", Link must approach close enough for the prompt to appear in the lower left corner. Click [here](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?catIds=9063) to see the locations of all the wells.  
**Reward:**
- 10 Rupees per well, up to 580 Rupees.
- [All's Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284502) upon finding them all.

**Note:** Fera may appear in many different wells and so this quest can be started in multiple locations. After starting the quest, Fera relocates to [Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276752)

locations.title: Follow the Cuccos
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Trissa after completing [Codgers' Quarrel](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279463)  
**Solution:** Bring her 10x Bird Egg. You may find enough in [Cucco Hideaway](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282061).  
**Reward:** Purple Rupee

locations.title: Secrets Within
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Pulcho.  

**Solution:** Use the [Device Dispenser](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280118) beside him.  

**Reward:** 1 Sundelion

locations.title: Master the Vehicle Prototype
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Fernison.  

**Solution:** Attach a Steering Stick to the nearby vehicle. The nearby [Device Dispenser](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280118) provides some. Then, complete the race within the time limit.  

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

locations.title: The Blocked Cave
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to the Rito warrior, Mazli, standing outside the blocked cave.  

**Solution:** Blow open the [Rospro Pass Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280283), either with bombs or a Boulder-type weapon.  

**Reward:** Red Rupee

locations.title: The Horse Guard's Request
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Toffa looking at the horses in the stable.  

**Solution:** 

- First, bring a Stalhorse to Toffa so he can see.  The closest [Stalhorse](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284493) can be found there.
- Next, he wants to see a tamed animal that isn't a horse. The closest would be a honeyvore bear in Dalite Forest, to the northwest.

**Reward:**
- 2x Pony Points
- A Purple Rupee and a Silver Rupee

locations.title: Treasure of The Secret Springs
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Tulin after completing [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)    
**Solution:** Travel to [North Biron Snowshelf Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280464) and solve the puzzle by blasting out all the rocks in the cave.  
**Reward:** [Vah Medoh Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280463)

locations.title: Misko's Cave of Chests
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Domidak in front of the [Cephla Lake Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284501).  

**Solution:** Feed the nearby dog fruits or meat, then follow it as he picks the right chest.  

**Reward:** [Ember Trousers](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279831)

locations.title: Misko's Treasure: The Fierce Deity
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Pick up the message in the bottle after completing [Misko's Cave of Chests](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280696).  

**Solution:** Collect the full Fierce Deity set, then equip it in [Cephla Lake Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280697)
- [Fierce Deity Boots](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279654)
- [Fierce Deity Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280133)
- [Fierce Deity Armor](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280700)  

**Reward:** [Fierce Deity Sword](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280702)

media.title: How To Get The Fierce Deity Armor In Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom

locations.title: A New Champion's Tunic
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Read Zelda's journal inside [Zelda's Secret Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279305)  

**Solution:** In Hyrule Castle's [Sanctum](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277516), light both braziers around the throne to reveal a secret room.  

**Reward:** [Champion's Leathers](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279434)

locations.title: The Abandoned Laborer
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Mota   
**Solution:** Build a cart with an explosive on the back to launch him across to where he needs to go    
**Reward:** Large Zonai Charge

locations.title: The Captured Tent
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Cave Mushrooms That Glow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279993) then talk to Nat and Meghyn at [Snowfield Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277694)  
**Solution:** Defeat the Monsters at [Mount Drena Foothill Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281042). 3x Bokoblins and 1 Moblin  
**Reward:** Spicy Steamed Mushrooms

locations.title: Legacy of the Rito
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Teba in Rito Village after completing [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)  
**Solution:** Bring Teba a swallow bow, five bundles of wood, and three diamonds.  
**Reward:** Great Eagle Bow

locations.title: The Rito Rope Bridge
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570), talk to Gesane standing next to the broken bridge to start the quest.  

**Solution:** You need to first go to [Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276752) and on the west side, talk to Karson to come and fix the bridge. Once you do that, you will need to meet with him and Gesane again here. Karson will ask for 20 bundles of wood so that he can fix the bridge.  

**Reward:**
- Fixed bridge to Rito Village
- Silver Rupee

locations.title: Fish for Fletching
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570), talk to Bedoli in Rito Village.  

**Solution:** Bring 3x Glowing Cave Fish to Bedoli.  

**Reward:**
- 10x Arrow
- [Bedoli](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284494)'s trading service.

locations.title: Soul of the Gorons
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Yunobo of the Gorons](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279572)
  
**Solution:** Deliver three diamonds, five flints, and one Cobble Crusher

**Reward:** Boulder Breaker

locations.title: The North Lomei Prophecy
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with the terminal at the center of the labyrinth.  

**Solution:**
- Reach the North Lomei Castle Top Floor, by the [Tenbez Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278354).
- Activate each of the four terminals within the Top Floor:
    - [North Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282918)
    - [South Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282919)
    - [East Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282922)
    - [Central Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282917)
- A new terminal will spawn atop the labyrinth; interact with it to open the gate to the [North Lomei Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281124); dive into it.
- Defeat the [Flux Construct III](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284497) to complete the quest.  

**Reward:** [Evil Spirit Greaves](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280876)

locations.title: Kaneli's Flight Training
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Kaneli after completing [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)  

**Solution:** Pass through at least 15 rings in under 30 seconds. 

**Reward:**
- Purple Rupee
- [Advanced Flying Course](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283192)

locations.title: WANTED: Hinox
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Gralens in the Emergency Shelter and ask about big monsters

**Solution:** Kill the [Hinox](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279784) found northeast of [Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276752) at [Trilby Plain](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277397)
 
**Reward:**
- Silver Rupee
- Gold Rupee, when all 3 _WANTED: XX_ quests are completed.

locations.title: WANTED: Molduga
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Gralens in the Emergency Shelter and ask about big monsters

**Solution:** Kill the [Molduga in the East Barrens](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278134).

**Reward:**
- Silver Rupee
- Gold Rupee, when all 3 _WANTED: XX_ quests are completed.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Molduga Miniboss Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: WANTED: Stone Talus
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Gralens in the Emergency Shelter

**Solution:** Kill the [Stone Talus in North Akkala Foothill](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283264) 

**Reward:**
- Silver Rupee
- Gold Rupee, when all 3 _WANTED: XX_ quests are completed.

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Stone Talus Miniboss Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: The Iceless Icehouse
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Anche, within the Icehouse.  

**Solution:** Make an ice block in the pool (using an ice weapon, an Ice Fruit or a White Chuchu Jelly). Then, Throw a fire Fruit on it until it shrinks small enough to fit on the shelf.  

**Reward:** Purple Rupee

locations.title: A Bottled Cry For Help
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Read bottled message

**Solution:** Head to [Mapla Point Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281060) and remove the boulder blocking the entrance to a deeper part of the cave.    
**Reward:** A Silver (100) Rupee

locations.title: Moon-Gazing Gorons
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to a pair of elderly Gorons after completing [Yunobo of Goron City](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279572)

**Solution:** Go to [Lake Ferona Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282529) just before midday. Get to a high vantage point and snap a picture of the circular light on the ground as it shines on the stone
 
**Reward:** Silver Rupee

locations.title: Ousting the Giants
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Kampo, just outside the stable.

**Solution:** 
- Defeat each of the following Hinoxes:
    - [The Youngest Hinox Brother](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282069), in [Rodai Lakefront Tunnel](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282070)
    - [The Middle Hinox Brother](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281890), in [Corta Lake Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281893)
    - [The Eldest Hinox Brother](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277997), in [Calora Lake Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277995)  

**Reward:** Mighty Fried Bananas

locations.title: Feathered Fugitives
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Finish [Gourmets Gone Missing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281249) and talk to Teli  

**Solution:** Find the five missing Cuccos in the area. Their locations are:
- Inside the stable
- On top of the stable, all the way atop the horsehead chimney
- On a very small rock formation in the river
- Near the stage
- In a tree next to Endai (he will remark upon it, giving you the clue)

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

locations.title: The Duchess Who Disappeared
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Selmie in the [East Biron Snowshelf Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281623).  
**Solution:** Speak with Selmie back on [Selmie's Spot](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280510).  
**Reward:** [Strong Zonaite Shield](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284496)

locations.title: Mine-Cart Land: Open for Business!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Bayge in the Southern Mine

**Solution:** Ride the cart and shoot 5 balloons. Play again and hit 7 balloons.

**Reward:** Hit 5 targets to earn 20 rupees.  Hit 7 targets to earn 50 rupees.

locations.title: Homegrown in Hateno
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Mayor Reede in the field. Only available after [The Mayoral Election](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282891)

**Solution:** Defend the crops from waves of Stals until morning or until you kill all the waves of Stal type enemies.
 
**Reward:** Sun Pumpkins x5

locations.title: Who Finds the Haven?
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [The Captured Tent](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280957)  
**Solution:** Go to [Sturnida Springs Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280478) and find the Mushroom Haven  
**Reward:** 
Mushrooms in the cave:
- Big Hearty Truffle
- 3x Hearty Truffle
- 14x Brightcap
- 5x Rushroom 
- 4x Chillshroom
- 4x Stamella Shroom

locations.title: The Ultimate Dish?
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Moza at the bottom of [Rikoha Hills Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279325)  
**Solution:** Give her dubious food and 5 rupees  
**Reward:** Monster Stew

locations.title: A Picture for Outskirt Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with empty frame  
**Solution:** Take a picture of a cherry tree  
**Reward:** 
- 1 Pony Point
- Egg Tart

locations.title: Cash in on Ripened Flint
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Meat for Meat](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279494) and talk to a Goron at a table  
**Solution:** Give 20 - 100 Flint, random chance it will be ripened flint. 50 is the recommended number to give.  
**Reward:** 1,000 rupees

locations.title: Gleeok Guts
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Malena

**Solution:** Bring 1 Gleeok Guts to her

**Reward:** Gold Rupee

locations.title: One-Hit Wonder!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Parcy  
**Solution:** Break the Rock  
**Reward:** ??

locations.title: Home on Arrange
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Mattison's Independence](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280181) first, then speak to Rhondson.  

**Solution:** Cough up 1,500 rupees, then get to the plot of land next to [Rasitakiwak Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277436) to speak to Granteson.

**Reward:** The ability to build your dream home, and [Hudson Construction Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283063)

locations.title: Lost in the Dunes
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Benja. Available after main story progression in the region.

**Solution:** Head to the Source of the Oasis Cave, a sand sinkhole southwest of the oasis. Talk to Ponthos and then make your way through the cave bombing the rocks. Once you reach the ladder, Ponthos will talk to you and tell you to meet him outside.  

**Reward:** One of the orbs needed for The Mysterious Eight side quest

locations.title: Lurelin Resort Project
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Bolson after completing [Lurelin Village Restoration Project](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395)  

**Solution:** Complete both [Master the Vehicle Prototype](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280180) and [The Tarrey Town Race Is On!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283894). Then, speak with Tali and Shabonne at the Construction Site.  

**Reward:** [Lurelin Water Rally](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284659)

locations.title: Rattled Ralera
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Ralera after completing [Lurelin Village Restoration Project](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395)  

**Solution:**   
1. Make her a Mighty Seafood Curry, using the following ingredients:
    - A Mighty Porgy, available for purchase on the docks of Lurelin Village;
    - Goron Spice, available at Goron's City [General Store](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276855);
    - Hylian Rice, obtainable by cutting grass all across Hyrule.
2. Summon a gust of wind, either by using a Fan or using a board-fused weapon.

**Reward:** [Lurelin Village Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284654)

locations.title: Dad's Blue Shirt
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Zuta after completing [Lurelin Village Restoration Project](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395)  

**Solution:** Build a raft and grab the [Island Lobster Shirt](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280844) out of the water.  

**Reward:** You keep the shirt!

locations.title: A Picture for Dueling Peaks Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Start the quest by examining the empty frame in [Dueling Peaks Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279177).  

**Solution:** Take a picture of the sunrise at the summit of Tuft Moutain, the same place where you get a [Korok Seed](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278265). 

**Reward:** 
- 1x Pony Point 
- Food (?)

locations.title: A Picture for the Wetland Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty painting frame.
  
**Solution:** Take a picture of a ring shape ruin and bring it to the stablemaster in [Wetland Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279178).  

**Reward:**
- 1x Pony Point
- Electro Elixir

locations.title: The South Lomei Prophecy
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Access the terminal in the middle of the labyrinth.  

**Solution:** Go to the [South Lomei Castle](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278358) and access all five terminals. Dive into the [South Lomei Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280841) into the Depths. Defeat the [Flux Construct III](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284443) in the [South Lomei Depths Labyrinth](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277946).   

**Reward:** [Evil Spirit Mask](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280877)

locations.title: A Picture for Riverside Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty picture frame.

**Solution:** Take a picture of a Great Goddess Statue and show it to the stablemaster. There are at least five that count:
- [The Temple of Time](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280926)
- [The Goddess Statue of Courage](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281483)
- [The Goddess Statue of Wisdom](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281636)
- [The Goddess Statue of Power](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282003)
- [The Mother Goddess Statue](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284473)

**Reward:**
- 1x Pony Point
- Energizing Crab Stir-Fry

locations.title: The Heroines' Secret
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Rotana in the Gerudo shelter. She wants you to take pictures of some writing for her. All are located in the stronghold.

**Solution:** 
1. Take off your clothes and you will be put in jail. Take a picture of the writing on the back wall.
2. In the training room. Break the boulders.  -3891, -2996, 0032
3. Past the classroom and into where they keep the sand seals. Ultrahand piece that is separated and insert into plaque. -3848, -2944, 0029
4. In the classroom. In two pieces. Stand on stool or back to grid coordinates to take a picture. -3858, 2982, 0032

**Reward:** 100 Rupees

locations.title: A Picture for Tabantha Bridge Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with empty frame in [Tabantha Bridge Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277814)    

**Solution:** Take a picture of the Ancient Columns at sunrise. Avoid or kill the [Flame Gleeok](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280461). 

**Reward:** One Pony Point and Hasty Elixir.

locations.title: The Mysterious Eighth
locations.description:
**Location** -3824, -2970, 0029

**How to Begin:** Speak to Rotana in the Gerudo stronghold. She wants you to find the 8 orbs and place them in their statue that correlates to in their hands.

**Solution:** You need to put the orbs in the statues hands. The symbol on the orb c
1. In main hall. -3887, -2971, 0033
2. Shelter Inn area above. Use Ascend -3913, -2929, 0037
3.  Shelter Bar. Sandstorm must be cleared. -3904, -2915, 0030.
4. West of the main entrance. Sandstorm must be cleared.  Beat the girls game.  -3818, -2878, 0043
5. East of the main gate. -3782, -2900, 0047
6. On top of a destroyed building. You have to blow sand away. -3802, -2966, 0057
7. Located at the Kara Kara bazaar. You have to complete the quest where you have to find the missing 3rd guy. After that you can take the ball. -3273, -2582, 0023

**Reward:**
- Topaz, Sapphire, Ruby and Diamond
- A full set of gerudo weapons and a shield
- Gold Rupee

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom The Mysterious Eighth Side Quest Walkthrough

locations.title: Whirly Swirly Things
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Kula  

**Solution:** Show Kula a photo of a whirlpool in water. 
- One can be found at the entrance to Zora Waterworks.
- Kula will then ask for a photo of a sand sinkhole. 
- Show Kula a photo of the sand sinkhole. One can be found in Gerudo Desert locations, like the Oasis Source.  

**Reward:** Endura Carrots x5

locations.title: To the Ruins!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Pokki at the east gate
    
**Solution:** 
1. Speak with her again and she will want to ride with you.
2. Rent a seal with sled and speak to her again.
3. Head east to the [East Gerudo Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=286552) at coordinates -2789, -2851, 0023

**Reward:** 100 Rupees

locations.title: The Tarrey Town Race Is On!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Fernison after completing [Master the Vehicle Prototype](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280180).  

**Solution:** Complete the race within 2 minutes. You may use any vehicle, as long as you use Fernison's Steering Stick.  

**Reward:**
- 3x Zonai Charge
- [Tarrey Town Race](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278094) minigame

locations.title: Pride of the Gerudo
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Isha after completing [The Missing Owner](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279845).
    
**Solution:** 
1. Bring her 4 diamonds, 10 flint, a Gerudo Scimitar and a Gerudo Shield.
2. All these items can be found around the desert. Also in  Temple of the Eighth. 

**Reward:** Scimitar of the Seven and Daybreaker

locations.title: The Blue Stone
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speake to Ledo after the main quest

**Solution:** Build a boat and go to Reservoir Lakefront Cavern and bring a blue stone back to Ledo

**Reward:** [Zora Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283905)

locations.title: The Fort at Ja'Abu Ridge
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Gaddison (found wandering the bridge).

**Solution:** Clear the [enemy fortress](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=286620)

**Reward:** 100 Rupees

locations.title: The Never-Ending Lecture
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Chroma after completing [Sidon of the Zora](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277434)

**Solution:** Retrieve the Zora Helm

**Reward:** [Zora Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279275)

locations.title: Secret Treasure under the Great Fish
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Sidon after completing [Sidon of the Zora](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277434)

**Solution:** Retrieve the Vah Ruta Divine Helm

**Reward:** [Vah Ruta Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280782)

locations.title: The Moonlit Princess
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Seggin

**Solution:**  Take a picture of the Mipha statue at Shatterback Point at night and show him.

**Reward:** Zora Sword

locations.title: True Treasure
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Kodah at the Inn

**Solution:** Go to [Tarm Point Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279803) and take Sasan to the other side.

**Reward:** 2x Opal

locations.title: Mine-Cart Land: Death Mountain
locations.description:
**Previous Side Quest:** [Mine-Cart Land: Quickshot Course](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284289)

**How To Begin:** Speak to Kabetta

**Reward:** [Goron Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283913)

locations.title: Glory of the Zora
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** Speak to Dento and give him three diamonds, five pieces of flint, and a Zora Spear.

**Reward:** Lightscale Trident

locations.title: A Crabulous Deal
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Cleff  

**Solution:** Give him 10x Bright-Eyed Crabs.  

**Reward:** Sapphire

locations.title: A Wife Wafted Away
locations.description:
**How to Start:** Speak to Fronk after the main quest.

**Solution:** Go back up to Wellsprings Island, either by the waterfall or by teleporting to [Igoshon Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278363). To the southeast of the shrine, a campfire can be seen. Talk to Mei.

**Reward:** Hearty Fish Skewer,

locations.title: A Token of Friendship
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Yona after completing [Sidon of the Zora](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277434)

**Solution:** Retrieve the Zora Greaves

**Reward:** [Zora Greaves](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279700)

locations.title: The Secret Room
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Ascend into the tree's mouth and speak with Oaki.

**Solution:** Give him 4x Nightshade and 2x Giant Brightbloom Seeds.

**Reward:** [Korok Fabric](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284221)

locations.title: Rock Roast or Dust
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Yunobo of Goron City](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279572) and speak to Cooke 

**Solution:** Go to the East Restaurant Cave. At the end of the cave will be the Rock Roast. Bring one back (Bringing more than one will despawn the others as soon as you present one to Cooke) and drop it in front of the counter

**Reward:** Seared Gourmet Steak

locations.title: Walton’s Treasure Hunt
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Ascend to the top of the Deku tree.

**Solution:**
- Find the Forest Dweller’s Sword right behind Walton above.
- Find the Forest Dweller’s Spear in front Walton behind a thick trunk near the rim.
- Report back to Walton.
- Go down to the ground, and find the Forest Dweller’s Shield leaning on top of the tree’s entrance.

**Reward:**
- Forest Dweller’s Sword
- Forest Dweller’s Spear
- Forest Dweller’s Shield
- Forest Dweller’s Bow

locations.title: Misko's Treasure of Awakening I
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Read the tablet inside of [Goronbi River Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280705), which is revealed after opening the chest containing the [Ember Shirt](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280706).  

**Solution:** Open the [Ancient Columns Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280853).  

**Reward:** [Tunic of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280855)

locations.title: Mine-Cart Land: Death Mountain
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Mine-Cart Land: Quickshot Course](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284289) with the best result. Speak to Kabetta.  

**Solution:** 8 targets within 2 minutes  

**Reward:** Goron Fabric

locations.title: Mine-Cart Land: Quickshot Course
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Mine-Cart Land: Open for Business!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282332) with the best result. Speak to Heehl

**Solution:** Seven targets within 1:20  

**Reward:** 50 Rupees

locations.title: Heat-Endurance Contest!
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Rahdo after beating the [Cold-Endurance Contest!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284321) side quest and pay 150 rupees.

**Solution:** Survive the heat for one day in your underwear.

Tips:
- Have a minimum of twenty-five hearts to win legitimately
- Equip an ice infused weapon or shield
- Eat some heat-resistant food

**Reward:** Gold Rupee.

locations.title: Cold Endurance Contest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Rahdo on top of the mountain and pay 50 Rupees.

**Solution:** Survive a night in the cold, without using clothing. 

Tips:
- Have a minimum of twenty-five hearts to win legitimately.
- Equip a fire infused weapon or shield
- Eat food or start a fire

**Reward:** Silver Rupee.

locations.title: A Picture for Highland Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty painting  

**Solution:** Take a picture of the [Giant White Horse](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283044)

**Reward:** 1 Pony Point and some food

locations.title: The Hidden Treasure at Lizard Lakes
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing Yunobo of Goron City main quest, talk to the village elder.

**Solution:** Go to [Lizard's Burrow](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280779) and claim [Vah Rudania Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280780)  

**Reward:** [Vah Rudania Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280780)

locations.title: Supply-Eyeing Fliers
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Huck.

**Solution:** Kill the three Aerocudas.

**Reward:** Purple Rupee.

locations.title: The Shrine Explorer
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete all 152 shrines

**Solution:** Open chest located behind Goddess statue.

**Reward:** [Ancient Hero's Aspect](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=289435)

locations.title: A Way to Trade, Washed Away
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Garini after completing both [Village Attacked by Pirates](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=290810) and [Lurelin Village Restoration Project](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282395).

**Solution:** Go to [Tenoko Island](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276913). Bring parts necessary to power and steer all 3 boats found there. Take them way back to Lurelin Village.  

**Reward:** Star Fragment and Garini's "shop", where you get everything for free.

locations.title: Uma's Garden
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing both [Teach Me a Lesson I](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276905) & [Teach Me a Lesson II](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280079), you can pick this up from Uma tending the nearby garden.

**Solution:** Give Uma a vegetable, then return after a few hours.  

**Reward:**
- A field filled with the vegetable you gave her;
- The ability to repeat the quest as much as you want.

locations.title: Gerudo's Colossal Fossil
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [Hebra's Colossal Fossil](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278386).

**Solution:** Put the baby fossil back together.  

**Reward:** Purple Rupee.

locations.title: A Picture for Foothill Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty painting frame  

**Solution:** Take a picture of the massive sculpture of Daruk, at [Goron City](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276852)  

**Reward:** One Pony Point and one bottle of Fireproof Elixir

locations.title: The Ancient City Gorondia?
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete [The Ancient City Gorondia!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278325). Dugby will later be found here, still trying to find his way there  

**Solution:** Follow Dugby when he rolls away. Clear the rocks on the tracks. Put the mine car on the tracks when the way is clear and speak to Dugby once more at the top and again at the bottom

**Reward:** Large Zonai Charge

locations.title: A Picture for Woodland Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty painting frame  

**Solution:** Take a picture of a Goron in some hotsprings. Easiest place is, obviously, the [Goron Hot Springs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277115)  

**Reward:** One Pony Point and some food

locations.title: The Mother Goddess Statue
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Pray at any Goddess Statue of [Power](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282810), [Wisdom](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281636), or [Courage](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282767) to begin this quest. You will return to the [Forgotten Temple](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278171) or if you have it unlocked already, [Mayausiy Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277697). Further in past the shine, you'll see that the Goddess Statue has fallen. Approach the head to examine it.

**Solution:** Complete all three Goddess Statue side quests and return to pray at the Mother Goddess Statue

**Reward:** The White Sword of the Sky

locations.title: A Picture for South Akkala Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty picture frame inside the tent  

**Solution:** Take a picture of the Unity Bell in Tarrey Town  

**Reward:** One Pony Point and Prime Meat Stew

locations.title: A Picture for New Serenne Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Interact with picture frame 

**Solution:** Take a picture of nearby geoglyph  

**Reward:** 
- Pony Point
- Bright Tomato 
- Mushroom Stew

locations.title: Decorate with Passion
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with Boraa, sitting by a tent.  

**Solution:** Show her any weapon fused with a Ruby.  

**Reward:** 1x Electric Keese Wing

locations.title: A Picture for Snowfield Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty frame on the Stable wall.

**Solution:** Go to the Lone Pine Tree on top of Talonto Peak and, looking North-West, take a picture of the Bird with outstretched wings.

**Reward:** 1 Pony Point, Spicy Meat Stew

locations.title: A Picture for Lakeside Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Examine the empty painting frame.  

**Solution:** On a clear day, go to Floria Bridge and take a picture of Floria Falls, just outside the stable.  

**Reward:** 
- 1x Pony Point  
- 1x Tough Tomato Soup

locations.title: A Picture for East Akkala Stable
locations.description:
**How to Begin:**
Examine the empty portrait frame

**Solution:** 
Take a picture of nearby Octorok Lake (SW of stable) when water levels have risen (during rain) to resemble an Octorok.

**Reward:**
- 1 Pony Point
- Meal and Rice Bowl

locations.title: Spotting Spot
locations.description:
**Previous Side Quest:** [The Incomplete Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277030)

**How To Begin:** Speak to Lester (requires a certain amount of plot progression)

Tame [Spot](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=285942) and bring it back to the Mini Stable.

**Reward:**
- Spot (Unique Horse)
- 50 Rupees
- Swift Carrot

**Note:** After completing the quest, speak to Lester again to register the unique horse.

locations.title: Dalia's Game
locations.description:
**How To Begin:** This is a part of The Mysterious Eighth side quest.

Speak to Dalia who is located next to the General Store in Gerudo Town, standing next to an orb. 

Dalia will ask if you want to play a game of hide and seek. 

**Solution:** You will have 1 minute and 30 seconds to locate a sand seal plush toy that has been hidden inside the Gerudo Shelter.

**Reward:** Orb that is part of The Mysterious Eighth side quest.

locations.title: Treasure of the Gerudo Desert
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to Riju a few days after the events of [Riju of the Desert](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279576).  

**Solution:** Make your way to the [West Gerudo Underground Ruins](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280778) and find [Vah Naboris Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280777).  

**Reward:** [Vah Naboris Divine Helm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280777)

locations.title: Unknown Three-Headed Monster
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete all three WANTED monster hunt side quests, then talk to Gralens to start another series of hunts. 

**Solution:** Defeat the [Flame Gleeok](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279729)   

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Flame Gleeok Miniboss Gameplay Walkthrough

locations.title: Unknown Huge Silhouette
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete all three WANTED monster hunt side quests, then talk to Gralens to start another series of hunts. 

**Solution:** Defeat the [Frox](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281951)  

**Reward:** Silver Rupee

locations.title: Unknown Sky Giant
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Complete all three WANTED monster hunt side quests, then talk to Gralens to start another series of hunts. 

**Solution:** Defeat the [Flux Construct III](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279853)

**Reward:** Silver Rupee (100)

locations.title: Misko's Treasure of Awakening II
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Read the stone tablet on the left of the chest containing [Tunic of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280855).  

**Solution:** Defeat the [Thunder Gleeok](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277325), then Ultrahand the claymore on the statue on the other side of the colosseum.  

**Reward:** [Trousers of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280868)

locations.title: Misko's Treasure: Pirate Manuscript
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing [Misko's Cave of Chests](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280696), trade 100 rupees to Dominiak.  

**Solution:** Go to [Cape Cales Cliffbase Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280873) and claim [Tingle's Tights](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280875).

**Reward:** [Tingle's Tights](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280875).

locations.title: Simmerstone Springs
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Kima on the bridge on top of the waterfall

**Solution:** Inside of Gorko Tunnel, break the rock wall and enter the hot spring   
**Reward:** 100 rupees

locations.title: Ancient Blades Below
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to one of the Mining Constructs after completing [Guidance From Ages Past](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=287480).

**Solution:** Give him the 50 Zonaite in exchange for an Ancient Blade.  

**Reward:**
- Ancient Blade
- Ability to trade 50 Zonaite for an Ancient Blade

locations.title: Misko's Treasure: Twins Manuscript
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing [Misko's Cave of Chests](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280696), trade 100 rupees to Dominiak.  

**Solution:** Head to [Dueling Peaks North Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281727) to grab the pattern from the ceiling. Then, head to [Dueling Peaks South Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280531) and solve the puzzle.  

**Reward:** [Tingle's Shirt](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280869)

locations.title: Misko's Treasure: Heroines Manuscript
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** After completing [Misko's Cave of Chests](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280696), trade 100 rupees to Dominiak.    

**Solution:** Open the [Statue of the Eighth Heroine Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280871).  

**Reward:** [Tingle's Hood](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280872)

locations.title: Misko's Treasure of Awakening III
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Read the stone tablet beside the chest containing [Trousers of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280868)  

**Solution:** Open the [Thundra Plateau Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280862)  

**Reward:** [Mask of Awakening](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280863)

locations.title: Village Attacked by Pirates
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Talk to Garini, who is talking to Mubs (she runs the general shop), after completing two [Regional Phenomena](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277708) temples.

**Solution:** Talk to Rozel found at [Lurelin Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278007)

**Reward:** Mighty Salt-Grilled Crab

media.title: The Legend Of Zelda Tears Of The Kingdom Ruffian Infested Village Gameplay Walkthrough Side Adventure

locations.title: Farosh, Lightning Dragon
locations.description: **Location:** Flies clockwise between [East Gerudo Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276837) and [Hills of Baumer Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277280) (and completes the circle in The Depths)

locations.title: Light Dragon
locations.description: **Location:** Circles the entire map high in the sky (passes all the Geoglyphs)

locations.title: Dinraal, Fire Dragon
locations.description: **Location:** Flies from east to west along the coast north coast between [East Akkala Plains Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277435) and [Drenan Highlands Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276850) (and repeats the cycle in the Depths)

locations.title: Naydra, Frost Dragon
locations.description: **Location:** Flies in a clockwise circle between [Naydra Snowfield Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277045) and [East Hill Chasm](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276827) - and completes the cycle in The Depths

locations.title: Yiga Clan Notebook
locations.description: Inside of the Yiga Clan tent, next to the [Large Chrystalized Charge Chest]().

locations.title: Aurie Notepad
locations.description: Inside [Carok Bridge Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277710).

locations.title: Temporarily Fallen - Aurie Taamu Notepad
locations.description: In [Goponga Village Ruins Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279326)

locations.title: Construct Horn - Aurie Taamu
locations.description: At the bottom of [Tabah Woods Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279337), behind the boulder.

locations.title: Note on the Table - Aurie Taamu
locations.description: **Location:**  In the [Outskirt Hill Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279317)

locations.title: Lookout Post Logbook
locations.description: Inside the building, ground floor.

locations.title: Lightning Helm Journal
locations.description: Before entering the room with the large column in the middle, continue down the hall and take the ladder. Follow the hall to the end.

locations.title: Learnings of the Zora, Part Six
Stormwind Ark Story
locations.description: Book telling the story of the Stormwind Ark, and the associated song.

locations.title: ZST: Three Big Ideas
locations.description: In the blue tent.

locations.title: Demon King Lore
locations.description: At the bottom of the circular staircase in the [Royal Hidden Passage](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280483)

locations.title: Note on the Table
locations.description: Written by Chef Aurie Taamu, the Lonely Cook. Found in [Popla Foothills South Well](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277809)

locations.title: Purah's Diary
locations.description: Under the bed on the 2nd floor.

locations.title: Learnings of the Zora, Anecdote Two
Crank
locations.description:
**Location:** At the end of the corridor, on the upper floor above the rubble.  
**How to solve:** Attach the debris to the rotating axel, then use Tulin's Gust to push the debris, rotating the axel and opening the door.

locations.title: Loose Cog
locations.description:
**Location:** On the side of the hallway.  
**How to Solve:** Shoot an icicle off the ceiling, then Attach it to link the loose cog to the moving one.

locations.title: Red Pillar
locations.description:
**Location:** Just a little southeast of [Miryotanog Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278162).
  
**How to Solve:** Part of the [Red Pillars Across a Vast Sea](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281150). Locate the nearby turnstile just west of the main tower and use it to elevate the tower so that the light hits the mirror.

locations.title: Red Pillar
locations.description:
**Location:** North of the [Arbitor's Grounds](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283873) and [Irasak Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278159).

**Solution:** Break the floor and grab one (or all if desired) of the stone handles. Get it to the roof of the pillar in any manner that works and attach it to the turnstile. Rotate the tower until it points at [the starting light](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281150).

locations.title: Switch
locations.description: In The Guard's Chamber. Put a Metal Box on this (can be found under the stairs, behind some burnable leaves) to open the outside access door, to come back later.

locations.title: Waterfall Cave Access
locations.description: Drop down here to access the cave behind the waterfall

locations.title: Launchpad
locations.description: On the ramp near the Korok camp - good place to launch a flying machine.

locations.title: Lockup Access Cave
locations.description: A small cave on the side of the cliff can be used to access the lockup.  You can use a boat then climb the cliff to access.

locations.title: Healing Pool
locations.description: At the back of the Shrine of Resurrection cave, where you start your adventure in Breath of the Wild. Swim in the water to heal yourself.

locations.title: Button
locations.description:
On top of the column - opens up [Ancient Columns Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280853)  

**Coordinates:** -3484, 0421, 0292

locations.title: Column
locations.description: Make a tall structure(4-5 logs long) and place it vertically on the south pillar at noon, to make the shadow touch the north pillar to open

locations.title: Sword
locations.description: Place the sword in the knight statue's hands to open [Coliseum Ruins Cave Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280867)

locations.title: The Great Deku Tree
locations.description:
To speak to the Great Deku Tree, stand on a cut stump on one of the large roots. It is marked by a thin leafy branch.

**Note:** Unavailable until Korok Forest is cleared of gloom.

locations.title: Button
locations.description: **Location:** Under the sand pile, use a [Korok-Frond Guster](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281210) to blow the sand away

locations.title: Fireball Tunnel
locations.description: **Hint:** You can use Ultrahand to stop the ball

locations.title: Hyrule Castle Moat West Chasm Entrance
locations.description: The entrance to the Hyrule Castle Moat West Chasm. It is located inside the rock wall of the mountain, among some trees,

locations.title: Light
locations.description:
**Location:** Behind the bricked up wall.

**Tip:** You can remove the bricks using Ultrahand  

**Tip 2:** Use Recall to sync the spinning cogs nearby to let the light through

locations.title: Secret Passage
locations.description: **Solution:** Shine the Light opposite on the statue here to unlock the passage

locations.title: Mirror
locations.description: **Location:** Under the sand pile

locations.title: Mirror
locations.description: **Location:** Lower level - in a sand pile

locations.title: Timed Snowboard Run
locations.description:
**Associated Shrine:** [Zakusu Shrine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277954)

The quest is unlisted, but it is necessary to unlock the shrine.

**Solution:** 
- Examine the green panel. Jump off the island, do a full dive, land on the slope, and snowboard through the green rings within the timers to unlock the shrine.

locations.title: Armor Shop Shortcut
locations.description:
Alley entrance for the [Gerudo Secret Club](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284929). Initially blocked by a wooden crate inside the armor shop.

After using the [Secret Shop Entrance](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279712) to Ascend into the shop the first time, walk down a hallway and look for a breakable crate. Destroy it to unblock the door for future use.

locations.title: Josha
locations.description: **Location:** [Lookout Landing](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276752)

locations.title: Suzuna
locations.description: In the small camp outside the chasm. Speak to her and she'll give you a random Elixir

locations.title: Zumi
locations.description: **Location:** Outside [New Serenne Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276878)

locations.title: Impa
locations.description: **Location:** On a platform in the open

locations.title: Pikango
locations.description: Near the Tower - painting a picture of a floating island

locations.title: Robbie
locations.description: **Location:**

locations.title: Bazz
locations.description: **Location:** In front of [Upland Zorana Skyview Tower](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276831), stuck in the mud.

locations.title: Mei
locations.description: **Location:** Standing by the water

locations.title: Dunma
locations.description: **Location:** On a pillar by [Toto Lake](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277082)

locations.title: Finlan
locations.description: **Location:** Inside the water chamber.

locations.title: Wadder
locations.description: Help him defeat the Bokoblin and he'll give you an _Energizing Cooked Stambulb_.  He'll also tell you about the various Insecta of Hyrule.

locations.title: Gladis
locations.description: ***Note:** Gladis talks to you about Bubbulfrogs. She explains they live in caves and tells you there are two people in a cave near the Woodland Stable in Eldin who will trade for the Bubbul gems.*

locations.title: Koltin
locations.description: **Location:** In [Tarrey Town](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278088)

locations.title: Meeshy
locations.description: Speak to them to mark the locations of Misko's Treasures

locations.title: Yiga Ambush
locations.description: He wants you to give him a Sundelion to "help" cure the Gloom.

locations.title: Canolo
locations.description:
**Location:** At the small camp

Speak to her and she'll give you a Mighty Simmered Fruit

locations.title: Calissa
locations.description:
**Location:** At the small camp

Speak to her to receive Rapid Simmered Fruit

locations.title: Yiga Assassin
locations.description: Disguised as a 'Researcher'.

locations.title: Yona
locations.description: Gives quest "Restoring the Zora Armor"

locations.title: The Stable Trotters
locations.description:
A musical troupe comprised of Mastro, Violynne, Beetz, Eustus, and Pyper.

You will need to reunite all members of the musical troupe though a series of Side Adventures in order to unlock Great Fairies and armor upgrades:
- [Great Fairy Tera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279490)
    - [Potential Princess Sightings](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846)
    - [Serenade to a Great Fairy](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279983)
- [Great Fairy Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279257)
    - [The Hornist's Dramatic Escape](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280076)
    - [Serenade to Mija](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280073)
- [Great Fairy Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279483)
    - [Honey, Bee Mine](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279476)
    - [Serenade to Cotera](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279990)
- [Great Fairy Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279489)
    - [The Flute Player's Plan](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280107)
    - [Serenade to Kaysa](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280108)

locations.title: Garill
locations.description:
**Location:** At a small campfire by the cliff.
Requires spicy pepper

locations.title: Ariane
locations.description: **Location:** Sweeping the broom by [New Serenne Stable](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276878).

locations.title: Giro
locations.description:
**Location:** At the small campfire in the canyon.

Requests a Splash Fruit

locations.title: Carl
locations.description: **Note:** You can also beign [Impa and the Geoglyphs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276885) by speaking to Carl

locations.title: Daval
locations.description: He speaks about his research.

locations.title: Cado
locations.description: If spoken to, starts [Impa and the Geoglyphs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276885).

locations.title: Cado
locations.description:
Location: Across the path from the stable.

Cado gives you the location of Impa and the quest [Impa and the Geoglyphs](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276885).

locations.title: Budder
locations.description: Will give you a _Tough Prime Meat & Seafood Fry_

locations.title: Calisa
locations.description: Very basic treasure hunting tips.

locations.title: Ornest
locations.description: Training mini-game

locations.title: Tabaga
locations.description:
Free him and he will reward you

**Rewards:**
- 1x Salt Grilled Meat
- 1x Sneaky Meat and Seafood Fry
- 1x Fairy Tonic

locations.title: Savrey
locations.description: Gives tips on cave locations and a meal

locations.title: Ponnick
locations.description: Teaches you about Lightbloom Seeds and how to deploy them in the dark.

locations.title: Huck
locations.description: Supply-Eyeing Flyers Side mission. Kill the flying enemies get a purple ruppee reward.

locations.title: Cima
locations.description: Quest objective for the Side Adventure: [The Beast and the Princess](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280074)

locations.title: Bedoli
locations.description:
**Location:** On a small plateau.  
**Note:** After completing [Fish for Fletching](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=280980), Bedoli will repeat his quest, offering 10 Arrows for 3 of a certain material. He can ask for:
- Glowing Cave Fish
- Chillfin Trout
- Brightcap

locations.title: Ramella
locations.description:
**Location:** Roaming around the entrance to [Goron City](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=276852).  
**Note:** After completing [Amber Dealer](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279944), Ramella will start asking for different ores. Bring the requested quantity to her, and she will purchase them at a slightly higher rate than shops.

locations.title: Botrick
locations.description: **Location:** In [Stalry Plateau Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282042), hiding behind a rock.

locations.title: Budder
locations.description:
Part of Captain Toran's squad for [Bring Peace to Akkala!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=282619).

He gives you an Energizing Mushroom Omelet.

locations.title: Hino
locations.description: Can be saved in the above Enemy camp. He will give you multiple meals.

locations.title: Canolo
locations.description: Part of Captain Flaxel's Monster-Control Crew. She offers Mighty Steamed Meat.

locations.title: Meeshy
locations.description: Provides Information About Misko's Treasure/Outfit Locations

locations.title: Calisa
locations.description: Legendary Treasure Hunter. You discuss the falling rocks from the sky and she tells you about a dream she has.

locations.title: Patricia - Riju's Sand Seal
locations.description: Feed Splash Fruit and she will give you coordinates to the orbs needed for The Heroines' Secret quest

locations.title: Penn
locations.description: After completing [Potential Princess Sightings!](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=277846), you can find Penn here.

locations.title: Wadder
locations.description: Save him from the bokoblin and he gives you a meal and a lesson about insects.

**Related Quest:** [Eldin's Colossal Fossil](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278285)

**Location:** Covered in breakable rocks inside the head of the Eldin Skeleton.  Place it inside the northern eye socket of the skeleton.

locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Riju of Gerudo Town](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279576)

After viewing the mural you'll be given a riddle:

_Standing back-to-back with the throne, witness red pillars across a vast sea. Unite the pillars in light to reveal the lightning stone and open the way. You who can hear my voice come to me. I await you_

locations.title: Lanayru Road Crystal
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [The Lanayru Road Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=283078) 

**Location:** Go through the brown breakable wall at the back of the cave's first chamber to find a second large chamber containing the crystal. The second chamger also contains 2 Rocket, 2 Fan and 1 Steering Stick zonai devices. They can be used, along with the Wing found encased in the blue rock wall in the cave's first chamber, to move the crystal to the shrine.

**Location:** On the main deck of the temple, just in front of the hatch. Activate it to reveal the other windmills.

locations.title: Windmill
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)  
**Location:** In the locked room. To open, Attach an icicle to the lever, then move it to the other side. Use Tulin's Gust to activate it.

locations.title: Windmill
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)  
**Location:** Near the main turbine, down the vent past the lasers. From the [Terminal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284370), ride the air current to the top of the temple, then Ultrahand the massive doors and glide down. Use Tulin's Gust to activate it.

locations.title: Windmill
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Tulin of Rito Village](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279570)  
**Location:** In a locked room on the main deck. Access from the trap to the lower level, beyond the [Crank](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284375). Use Tulin's Gust to activate it.

locations.title: Windmill
locations.description:

**Location:** In a locked room, beyond the [Loose Cog](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=284376).

locations.title: The Gisa Crater Crystal
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [The Gisa Crater Crystal](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281683)

**Location:** Inside [Gisa Crater Cave](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=278230), near the northwest entrance. Attach a rocket to the crystal, place it beneath the cave opening, and launch it out of the cave.

locations.title: Gong
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Yunobo of Goron City](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279572)
 
**Location:** At back of room. Use Yunobo's ability to ring gong. Opens one of temple's locks.

locations.title: Lightning Stone
locations.description:
**Related Quest:** [Riju of Gerudo Town](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=279576) and [Red Pillars Across a Vast Sea](https://mapgenie.io/zelda-tears-of-the-kingdom/maps/hyrule?locationIds=281150).

**Location:** Stand at western end of corridor between two rows of stone blocks. Use Vow of Yunobo and aim him to east so he travels between the two rows.

Wear the full Charged Armor Set and drop a Zonai Charge onto the altar at the very back of the chamber.
